And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will remove from him his misdeeds and admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. That is the great attainment.

ayah.transliteration: Wallazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi aayaaatinaaa ulaaa'ika ashaabun naari khaalideena feehaa bi'sal maseer
ayah.translation: But the ones who disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of the Fire, abiding eternally therein; and wretched is the destination.

ayah.transliteration: Maaa asaaba mim musee batin illaa bi-iznil laah; wa many yu'mim billaahi yahdi qalbah; wallaahu bikulli shai;in Aleem
ayah.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah. And whoever believes in Allah - He will guide his heart. And Allah is Knowing of all things.

ayah.transliteration: Wa atee'ul laaha wa atee'ur Rasool; fa in tawallaitum fa innamaa 'alaa Rasoolinal balaaghul mubeen
ayah.translation: And obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon Our Messenger is only [the duty of] clear notification.

ayah.transliteration: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; wa 'alal laahi falyata wakkalil mu'minoon
ayah.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him. And upon Allah let the believers rely.

ayah.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo inna min azwaaji kum wa awlaadikum 'aduwwal lakum fahzaroohum; wa in ta'foo wa tasfahoo wa taghfiroo fa innal laaha ghafoorur Raheem
ayah.translation: O you who have believed, indeed, among your wives and your children are enemies to you, so beware of them. But if you pardon and overlook and forgive - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

ayah.transliteration: Innamaa amwaalukum wa awlaadukum fitnah; wallaahu 'indahooo ajrun 'azeem
ayah.translation: Your wealth and your children are but a trial, and Allah has with Him a great reward.

ayah.transliteration: Fattaqul laaha mastat'tum wasma'oo wa atee'oo waanfiqoo khairal li anfusikum; wa many-yooqa shuha nafsihee fa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
ayah.translation: So fear Allah as much as you are able and listen and obey and spend [in the way of Allah]; it is better for your selves. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful.

ayah.transliteration: In tuqridul laaha qardan hasanany yudd'ifhu lakum wa yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Shakoorun Haleem
ayah.translation: If you loan Allah a goodly loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you. And Allah is Most Appreciative and Forbearing.

ayah.transliteration: 'Aalimul-Ghaibi wash-shahaadatil 'Azeezul Hakeem
ayah.translation: Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

ayah.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhan nabiyyu izaa tallaqtummun nisaaa'a fatalliqoohunna li'iddatihinna wa ahsul'iddata; wattaqul laaha rabbakum laa tukhri joohunna mim bu-yootihinna wa laa yakhrujna illaaa any yaateema bifaahishatim mubaiyinah; wa tilka hudoodul laah; wa many yata'adda hudoodal laahi faqad zalama nafsha; laa tadree la'allal laaha yuhdisu ba'dazaalika amraa
ayah.translation: O Prophet, when you [Muslims] divorce women, divorce them for [the commencement of] their waiting period and keep count of the waiting period, and fear Allah, your Lord. Do not turn them out of their [husbands'] houses, nor should they [themselves] leave [during that period] unless they are committing a clear immorality. And those are the limits [set by] Allah. And whoever transgresses the limits of Allah has certainly wronged himself. You know not; perhaps Allah will bring about after that a [different] matter.

ayah.transliteration: Fa izaa balaghna ajalahunna fa amsikoohunna bima'roofin aw faariqoohunna bima'roofinw wa ashhidoo zawai 'adlim minkum wa aqeemush shahaadata lillaah; zaalikum yoo'azu bihee man kaana yu'minu billaahi wal yawmil aakhir; wa many yattaqil laaha yaj'al lahoo makhrajaa
ayah.translation: And when they have [nearly] fulfilled their term, either retain them according to acceptable terms or part with them according to acceptable terms. And bring to witness two just men from among you and establish the testimony for [the acceptance of] Allah. That is instructed to whoever should believe in Allah and the Last day. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out

ayah.transliteration: Wa yarzuqhu min haisu laa yahtasib; wa many yatawakkal 'alal laahi fahuwa husbuh; innal laaha baalighu amrih; qad ja'alal laahu likulli shai'in qadraa
ayah.translation: And will provide for him from where he does not expect. And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose. Allah has already set for everything a [decreed] extent.

ayah.transliteration: Wallaaa'ee ya'isna minal maheedi min nisaaa 'ikum inir tabtum fa'iddatuhunna salaasatu ashhurinw wallaaa'ee lam yahidn; wa ulaatul ahmaali ajaluhunna any yada'na hamlahun; wa many yattaqil laaha yaj'al lahoo min armrihee yusraa
ayah.translation: And those who no longer expect menstruation among your women - if you doubt, then their period is three months, and [also for] those who have not menstruated. And for those who are pregnant, their term is until they give birth. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him of his matter ease.

ayah.transliteration: Zaalika amrul laahi anzalahoo ilaikum; wa many yattaqil laaha yukaffir 'anhu saiyi aatihee wa yu'zim lahoo ajraa
ayah.translation: That is the command of Allah, which He has sent down to you; and whoever fears Allah - He will remove for him his misdeeds and make great for him his reward.

ayah.transliteration: Askinoohunna min haisu sakantum minw wujdikum wa laa tudaaarroohunna litudaiyiqoo 'alaihinn; wa in kunna ulaati hamlin fa anfiqoo 'alihinna hattaa yada'na hamlahunn; fain arda'na lakum fa aatoo hunna ujoorahunna waatamiroo bainakum bima'roofinw wa in ta'aasartum fasaturdi'u lahooo ukhraa
ayah.translation: Lodge them [in a section] of where you dwell out of your means and do not harm them in order to oppress them. And if they should be pregnant, then spend on them until they give birth. And if they breastfeed for you, then give them their payment and confer among yourselves in the acceptable way; but if you are in discord, then there may breastfeed for the father another woman.

ayah.transliteration: Liyuntiq zoo sa'atim min sa'atihee wa man qudira 'alaihi riquhoo falyunfiq mimmaaa aataahul laah; laa yukalliful laahu nafsan illaa maaa aataahaa; sa yaj'alul laahu ba'da'usriny yusraa
ayah.translation: Let a man of wealth spend from his wealth, and he whose provision is restricted - let him spend from what Allah has given him. Allah does not charge a soul except [according to] what He has given it. Allah will bring about, after hardship, ease.

ayah.transliteration: Wa ka ayyim min qaryatin 'atat 'an amri Rabbihaa wa Rusulihee fahaasabnaahaa hisaaban shadeedanw wa 'azzabnaahaa 'azaaban nukraa
ayah.translation: And how many a city was insolent toward the command of its Lord and His messengers, so We took it to severe account and punished it with a terrible punishment.

ayah.transliteration: Fazaaqat wabbala amrihaa wa kaana 'aaqibatu amrihaa khusraa
ayah.translation: And it tasted the bad consequence of its affair, and the outcome of its affair was loss.

ayah.transliteration: A'addal laahu lahum 'azaaban shadeedan fattaqul laaha yaaa ulil albaab, allazeena aammanoo; qad anzalal laahu ilaikum zikraa
ayah.translation: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment; so fear Allah, O you of understanding who have believed. Allah has sent down to you the Qur'an.

ayah.transliteration: Rasoolany yatloo 'alaikum aayaatil laahi mubaiyinaatil liyukhrijal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati minaz zulumaati ilan noor; wa many yu'mim billaahi wa ya;mal saalihany yudkhilhu jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa abadan qad ahsanal laahu lahoo rizqqq
ayah.translation: [He sent] a Messenger [Muhammad] reciting to you the distinct verses of Allah that He may bring out those who believe and do righteous deeds from darknesses into the light. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will admit him into gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein forever. Allah will have perfected for him a provision.

ayah.transliteration: Allaahul lazee khalaq Sab'a Samaawaatinw wa minal ardi mislahunna yatanazzalul amru bainahunna lita'lamooo annal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeerunw wa annal laaha qad ahaata bikulli shai'in ilmaa
ayah.translation: It is Allah who has created seven heavens and of the earth, the like of them. [His] command descends among them so you may know that Allah is over all things competent and that Allah has encompassed all things in knowledge.

ayah.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhan nabiyyu lima tuharrimu maaa ahallal laahu laka tabtaghee mardaata azwaajik; wallaahu ghafoorur raheem
ayah.translation: O Prophet, why do you prohibit [yourself from] what Allah has made lawful for you, seeking the approval of your wives? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

ayah.transliteration: Qad faradal laahu lakum tahillata aymaanikum; wallaahu mawlaakum wa huwal'aleemul hakeem
ayah.translation: Allah has already ordained for you [Muslims] the dissolution of your oaths. And Allah is your protector, and He is the Knowing, the Wise.

ayah.transliteration: Wa iz asarran nabiyyu ilaa ba'di azwaajihee hadeesan falammaa nabba at bihee wa azharahul laahu 'alaihi 'arrafa ba'dahoo wa a'rada 'am ba'din falammaa nabba ahaa bihee qaalat man amba aka haaza qaala nabba aniyal 'aleemul khabeer
ayah.translation: And [remember] when the Prophet confided to one of his wives a statement; and when she informed [another] of it and Allah showed it to him, he made known part of it and ignored a part. And when he informed her about it, she said, "Who told you this?" He said, "I was informed by the Knowing, the Acquainted."

ayah.transliteration: In tatoobaaa ilal laahi faqad saghat quloobukumaa wa in tazaaharaa 'alihi fa innal laaha huwa mawlaahu wa jibreelu wa saalihul mu'mineen; walma laaa'ikatu ba'dazaalika zaheer
ayah.translation: If you two [wives] repent to Allah, [it is best], for your hearts have deviated. But if you cooperate against him - then indeed Allah is his protector, and Gabriel and the righteous of the believers and the angels, moreover, are [his] assistants.

ayah.transliteration: 'Asaa rabbuhooo in tallaqakunna anyyubdilahooo azwaajan khairam mnkunna muslimaatim mu'minaatin qaanitaatin taaa'ibaatin 'aabidaatin saaa'ihaatin saiyibaatinw wa abkaaraa
ayah.translation: Perhaps his Lord, if he divorced you [all], would substitute for him wives better than you - submitting [to Allah], believing, devoutly obedient, repentant, worshipping, and traveling - [ones] previously married and virgins.

ayah.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena samanoo qooo anfusakum wa ahleekum naaranw waqoodu han naasu wal hijaaratu 'alaihaa malaaa'ikatun ghilaazun shidaadul laa ya'soonal laaha maa amarahum wa yaf'aloona maa yu'maroon
ayah.translation: O you who have believed, protect yourselves and your families from a Fire whose fuel is people and stones, over which are [appointed] angels, harsh and severe; they do not disobey Allah in what He commands them but do what they are commanded.

ayah.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena kafaroo la ta'tazinul yawma innamaa tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon
ayah.translation: O you who have disbelieved, make no excuses that Day. You will only be recompensed for what you used to do.

ayah.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aammano toobooo ilal laahi tawbatan nasoohan 'asaa rabbukum any-yukaffira 'ankum sayyi aatikum wa yudkhilakum jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru yawma laa yukhzil laahun nabiyya wallazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo nooruhum yas'aa baina aydeehim wa bi aymaanihim yaqooloona rabbanaaa atmim lanaa nooranaa waghfir lana innaka 'alaa kulli shai'in qadeer
ayah.translation: O you who have believed, repent to Allah with sincere repentance. Perhaps your Lord will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you into gardens beneath which rivers flow [on] the Day when Allah will not disgrace the Prophet and those who believed with him. Their light will proceed before them and on their right; they will say, "Our Lord, perfect for us our light and forgive us. Indeed, You are over all things competent."

ayah.transliteration: yaaa ayyuuhan nabiyyu jaahidil kuffaara walmunaa-fiqeena waghluz 'alaihim; wa maawaahum jahannamu wa bi'sal maseer
ayah.translation: O Prophet, strive against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh upon them. And their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the destination.

ayah.transliteration: Darabal laahu masalal lillazeena kafarum ra ata Noobinw wamra ata Loot, kaanataa tahta 'abdaini min 'ibaadinaa saalihaini fakhaanataahumaa falam yughniyaa 'anhumaa minal laahi shai anw-wa qeelad khulan naara ma'ad Daakhileen
ayah.translation: Allah presents an example of those who disbelieved: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. They were under two of Our righteous servants but betrayed them, so those prophets did not avail them from Allah at all, and it was said, "Enter the Fire with those who enter."

ayah.transliteration: Wa darabal laahu masa lal-lillazeena aamanumra ata Fir'awn; iz qaalat rabbibni lee 'indaka baitan fil jannati wa najjinee min Fir'awna wa 'amalihii wa najjinee minal qawmiz zaalimeen
ayah.translation: And Allah presents an example of those who believed: the wife of Pharaoh, when she said, "My Lord, build for me near You a house in Paradise and save me from Pharaoh and his deeds and save me from the wrongdoing people."

ayah.transliteration: Wa Maryamab nata 'Imraanal lateee ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehi mir roobinaa wa saddaqat bikali maati Rabbihaa wa Kutubihee wakaanat minal qaaniteen
ayah.translation: And [the example of] Mary, the daughter of 'Imran, who guarded her chastity, so We blew into [her garment] through Our angel, and she believed in the words of her Lord and His scriptures and was of the devoutly obedient.

ayah.transliteration: Tabaarakal lazee biyadihil mulku wa huwa 'alaa kulli shai-in qadeer
ayah.translation: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent -

ayah.transliteration: Allazee khalaqal mawta walhayaata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu 'amalaa; wa huwal 'azeezul ghafoor
ayah.translation: [He] who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed - and He is the Exalted in Might, the Forgiving -

ayah.transliteration: Allazee khalaqa sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqam maa taraa fee khalqir rahmaani min tafaawutin farji'il basara hal taraa min futoor
ayah.translation: [And] who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency. So return [your] vision [to the sky]; do you see any breaks?

ayah.transliteration: Summar ji'il basara karrataini yanqalib ilaikal basaru khaasi'anw wa huwa haseer
ayah.translation: Then return [your] vision twice again. [Your] vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued.

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad zaiyannas samaaa'ad dunyaa bimasaa beeha wa ja'alnaahaa rujoomal lish shayaateeni wa a'tadnaa lahum 'azaabas sa'eer
ayah.translation: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made [from] them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze.

ayah.transliteration: Wa lillazeena kafaroo bi rabbihim 'azaabu jahannama wa bi'sal maseer
ayah.translation: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell, and wretched is the destination.

ayah.transliteration: Izaaa ulqoo feehaa sami'oo lahaa shaheeqanw wa hiya tafoor
ayah.translation: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.

ayah.transliteration: Takaadu tamayyazu minal ghaizi kullamaaa uliqya feehaa fawjun sa alahum khazanatuhaaa alam yaatikum nazeer
ayah.translation: It almost bursts with rage. Every time a company is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, "Did there not come to you a warner?"

ayah.transliteration: Qaaloo balaa qad jaaa'anaa nazeerun fakazzabnaa wa qulnaa maa nazzalal laahu min shai in in antum illaa fee dalaalin kabeer
ayah.translation: They will say," Yes, a warner had come to us, but we denied and said, 'Allah has not sent down anything. You are not but in great error.'"

ayah.transliteration: Wa qaaloo law kunnaa nasma'u awna'qilu maa kunnaa feee as haabis sa'eer
ayah.translation: And they will say, "If only we had been listening or reasoning, we would not be among the companions of the Blaze."

ayah.transliteration: Fa'tarafoo bizambihim fasuhqal li as haabis sa'eer
ayah.translation: And they will admit their sin, so [it is] alienation for the companions of the Blaze.

ayah.transliteration: Innal lazeena yakhshawna rabbahum bilghaibi lahum maghfiratunw wa ajrun kabeer
ayah.translation: Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward.

ayah.transliteration: Wa asirroo qawlakum awijharoo bihee innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor
ayah.translation: And conceal your speech or publicize it; indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

ayah.transliteration: Alaa ya'lamu man khalaq wa huwal lateeful khabeer
ayah.translation: Does He who created not know, while He is the Subtle, the Acquainted?

ayah.transliteration: Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul arda zaloolan famshoo fee manaakibihaa wa kuloo mir rizqihee wa ilaihin nushoor
ayah.translation: It is He who made the earth tame for you - so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision - and to Him is the resurrection.

ayah.transliteration: 'A-amintum man fissamaaa'i aiyakhsifa bi kumul arda fa izaa hiya tamoor
ayah.translation: Do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway?

ayah.transliteration: Am amintum man fissamaaa'i ai yursila 'alaikum haasiban fasata'lamoona kaifa nazeer
ayah.translation: Or do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not send against you a storm of stones? Then you would know how [severe] was My warning.

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fakaifa kaana nakeer
ayah.translation: And already had those before them denied, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yaraw ilat tairi fawqahum saaaffaatinw wa yaqbidn; maa yumsikuhunna illaar rahmaan; innahoo bikulli shai im baseer
ayah.translation: Do they not see the birds above them with wings outspread and [sometimes] folded in? None holds them [aloft] except the Most Merciful. Indeed He is, of all things, Seeing.

ayah.transliteration: Amman haazal lazee huwa jundul lakum yansurukum min doonir rahmaan; inilkaafiroona illaa fee ghuroor
ayah.translation: Or who is it that could be an army for you to aid you other than the Most Merciful? The disbelievers are not but in delusion.

ayah.transliteration: Amman haazal lazee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah; bal lajjoo fee 'utuwwinw wa nufoor
ayah.translation: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion.

ayah.transliteration: Afamai yamshee mukibban 'alaa wajhihee ahdaaa ammany yamshee sawiyyan 'alaa siratim mustaqeem
ayah.translation: Then is one who walks fallen on his face better guided or one who walks erect on a straight path?

ayah.transliteration: Qul huwal lazee ansha akum wa ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal absaara wal af'idata qaleelam maa tashkuroon
ayah.translation: Say, "It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful."

ayah.transliteration: Qul huwal lazee zara akum fil ardi wa ilaihi tuhsharoon
ayah.translation: Say, "It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered."

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
ayah.translation: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

ayah.transliteration: Qul innamal 'ilmu 'indallaahi wa innamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen
ayah.translation: Say, "The knowledge is only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner."

ayah.transliteration: Falaammaa ra-awhu zulfatan seee'at wujoohul lazeena kafaroo wa qeela haazal lazee kuntum bihee tadda'oon
ayah.translation: But when they see it approaching, the faces of those who disbelieve will be distressed, and it will be said, "This is that for which you used to call."

ayah.transliteration: Qul ara'aytum in ahlaka niyal laahu wa mam ma'iya aw rahimanaa famai-yujeerul kaafireena min 'azaabin aleem
ayah.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "Have you considered: whether Allah should cause my death and those with me or have mercy upon us, who can protect the disbelievers from a painful punishment?"

ayah.transliteration: Qul huwar rahmaanu aamannaa bihee wa 'alaihi tawakkalnaa fasata'lamoona man huwa fee dalaalim mubeen
ayah.translation: Say, "He is the Most Merciful; we have believed in Him, and upon Him we have relied. And you will [come to] know who it is that is in clear error."

ayah.transliteration: Qul ara'aytum in asbaha maaa'ukum ghawran famai yaateekum bimaaa'im ma'een
ayah.translation: Say, "Have you considered: if your water was to become sunken [into the earth], then who could bring you flowing water?"

ayah.transliteration: Noon; walqalami wa maa yasturoon
ayah.translation: Nun. By the pen and what they inscribe,

ayah.transliteration: Maa anta bini'mati Rabbika bimajnoon
ayah.translation: You are not, [O Muhammad], by the favor of your Lord, a madman.

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna laka la ajran ghaira mamnoon
ayah.translation: And indeed, for you is a reward uninterrupted.

ayah.transliteration: Wa innaka la'alaa khuluqin 'azeem
ayah.translation: And indeed, you are of a great moral character.

ayah.transliteration: Fasatubsiru wa yubsiroon
ayah.translation: So you will see and they will see

ayah.transliteration: Bi ayyikumul maftoon
ayah.translation: Which of you is the afflicted [by a devil].

ayah.transliteration: Innaa Rabbaka Huwa a'lamu biman dalla 'an sabeelihee wa Huwa a'lamu bilmuhtadeen
ayah.translation: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has gone astray from His way, and He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided.

ayah.transliteration: Falaa tuti'il mukazzibeen
ayah.translation: Then do not obey the deniers.

ayah.transliteration: Waddoo law tudhinu fa-yudhinoon
ayah.translation: They wish that you would soften [in your position], so they would soften [toward you].

ayah.transliteration: Wa laa tuti' kulla hallaa fim maheen
ayah.translation: And do not obey every worthless habitual swearer

ayah.transliteration: Hammaazim mash shaaa'im binameem
ayah.translation: [And] scorner, going about with malicious gossip -

ayah.transliteration: Mannaa'il lilkhairi mu'tadin aseem
ayah.translation: A preventer of good, transgressing and sinful,

ayah.transliteration: 'Utullim ba'da zaalika zaneem
ayah.translation: Cruel, moreover, and an illegitimate pretender.

ayah.transliteration: An kaana zaa maalinw-wa baneen
ayah.translation: Because he is a possessor of wealth and children,

ayah.transliteration: Izaa tutlaa 'alaihi aayaatunaa qaala asaateerul awwaleen
ayah.translation: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

ayah.transliteration: Sanasimuhoo 'alal khurtoom
ayah.translation: We will brand him upon the snout.

ayah.transliteration: Innaa balawnaahum kamaa balawnaaa As-haabal jannati iz 'aqsamoo la-yasri munnahaa musbiheen
ayah.translation: Indeed, We have tried them as We tried the companions of the garden, when they swore to cut its fruit in the [early] morning

ayah.transliteration: Wa laa yastasnoon
ayah.translation: Without making exception.

ayah.transliteration: Fataafa 'alaihaa taaa'i fum mir rabbika wa hum naaa'imoon
ayah.translation: So there came upon the garden an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep.

ayah.transliteration: Fa asbahat kassareem
ayah.translation: And it became as though reaped.

ayah.transliteration: Fatanaadaw musbiheen
ayah.translation: And they called one another at morning,

ayah.transliteration: Anighdoo 'alaa harsikum in kuntum saarimeen
ayah.translation: [Saying], "Go early to your crop if you would cut the fruit."

ayah.transliteration: Fantalaqoo wa hum yatakhaafatoon
ayah.translation: So they set out, while lowering their voices,

ayah.transliteration: Al laa yadkhulannahal yawma 'alaikum miskeen
ayah.translation: [Saying], "There will surely not enter it today upon you [any] poor person."

ayah.transliteration: Wa ghadaw 'alaa hardin qaadireen
ayah.translation: And they went early in determination, [assuming themselves] able.

ayah.transliteration: Falammaa ra awhaa qaalooo innaa ladaaalloon
ayah.translation: But when they saw it, they said, "Indeed, we are lost;

ayah.transliteration: Bal nahnu mahroomoon
ayah.translation: Rather, we have been deprived."

ayah.transliteration: Qaala awsatuhum alam aqul lakum law laa tusabbihoon
ayah.translation: The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you, 'Why do you not exalt [Allah]?' "

ayah.transliteration: Qaaloo subhaana rabbinaaa innaa kunnaa zaalimeen
ayah.translation: They said, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."

ayah.transliteration: Fa aqbala ba'duhum 'alaa ba'diny yatalaawamoon
ayah.translation: Then they approached one another, blaming each other.

ayah.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa wailanaaa innaa kunnaa taagheen
ayah.translation: They said, "O woe to us; indeed we were transgressors.

ayah.transliteration: 'Asaa rabbunaaa any yubdilanaa khairam minhaaa innaaa ilaa rabbinaa raaghiboon
ayah.translation: Perhaps our Lord will substitute for us [one] better than it. Indeed, we are toward our Lord desirous."

ayah.transliteration: Kazaalikal azaab, wa la'azaabul aakhirati akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon
ayah.translation: Such is the punishment [of this world]. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.

ayah.transliteration: Inna lilmuttaqeena 'inda rabbihim jannaatin na'eem
ayah.translation: Indeed, for the righteous with their Lord are the Gardens of Pleasure.

ayah.transliteration: Afanaj'alul muslimeena kalmujrimeen
ayah.translation: Then will We treat the Muslims like the criminals?

ayah.transliteration: Maa lakum kaifa tahhkumoon
ayah.translation: What is [the matter] with you? How do you judge?

ayah.transliteration: Am lakum kitaabun feehi tadrusoon
ayah.translation: Or do you have a scripture in which you learn

ayah.transliteration: Inna lakum feehi lamaa takhaiyaroon
ayah.translation: That indeed for you is whatever you choose?

ayah.transliteration: Am lakum aymaanun 'alainaa baalighatun ilaa yawmil qiyaamati inna lakum lamaa tahkumoon
ayah.translation: Or do you have oaths [binding] upon Us, extending until the Day of Resurrection, that indeed for you is whatever you judge?

ayah.transliteration: Salhum ayyuhum bizaa lika za'eem
ayah.translation: Ask them which of them, for that [claim], is responsible.

ayah.transliteration: Am lahum shurakaaa'u falyaatoo bishurakaaa 'ihim in kaanoo saadiqeen
ayah.translation: Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners, if they should be truthful.

ayah.transliteration: Yawma yukshafu 'am saaqinw wa yud'awna ilas sujoodi falaa yastatee'oon
ayah.translation: The Day the shin will be uncovered and they are invited to prostration but the disbelievers will not be able,

ayah.transliteration: Khaashi'atan absaaruhum tarhaquhum zillatunw wa qad kaanoo yud'awna ilassujoodi wa hum saalimoon
ayah.translation: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. And they used to be invited to prostration while they were sound.

ayah.transliteration: Fazarnee wa many yukazzibu bihaazal hadeesi sanastad rijuhum min haisu laa ya'lamoon
ayah.translation: So leave Me, [O Muhammad], with [the matter of] whoever denies the Qur'an. We will progressively lead them [to punishment] from where they do not know.

ayah.transliteration: Wa umlee lahum; inna kaidee mateen
ayah.translation: And I will give them time. Indeed, My plan is firm.

ayah.transliteration: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum mim maghramim musqaloon
ayah.translation: Or do you ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

ayah.transliteration: Am 'indahumul ghaibu fahum yaktuboon
ayah.translation: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

ayah.transliteration: Fasbir lihkmi rabbika wa laa takun kasaahibil boot; iz naadaa wa huwa makzoom
ayah.translation: Then be patient for the decision of your Lord, [O Muhammad], and be not like the companion of the fish when he called out while he was distressed.

ayah.transliteration: Law laaa an tadaara kahoo ni'matum mir rabbihee lanubiza bil'araaa'i wa huwa mazmoom
ayah.translation: If not that a favor from his Lord overtook him, he would have been thrown onto the naked shore while he was censured.

ayah.transliteration: Fajtabaahu rabbuhoo faja'alahoo minas saaliheen
ayah.translation: And his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous.

ayah.transliteration: Wa iny-yakaadul lazeena kafaroo la-yuzliqoonaka biabsaarihim lammaa saml'uz-Zikra wa yaqooloona innahoo lamajnoon
ayah.translation: And indeed, those who disbelieve would almost make you slip with their eyes when they hear the message, and they say, "Indeed, he is mad."

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen
ayah.translation: But it is not except a reminder to the worlds.

ayah.transliteration: Al haaaqqah
ayah.translation: The Inevitable Reality -

ayah.transliteration: Mal haaaqqah
ayah.translation: What is the Inevitable Reality?

ayah.transliteration: Wa maaa adraaka mal haaaqqah
ayah.translation: And what can make you know what is the Inevitable Reality?

ayah.transliteration: Kazzabat samoodu wa 'Aadum bil qaari'ah
ayah.translation: Thamud and 'Aad denied the Striking Calamity.

ayah.transliteration: Fa-ammaa Samoodu fauhlikoo bittaaghiyah
ayah.translation: So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast].

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammaa 'Aadun fa uhlikoo bireehin sarsarin 'aatiyah
ayah.translation: And as for 'Aad, they were destroyed by a screaming, violent wind

ayah.transliteration: Sakhkharahaa 'alaihim sab'a la yaalinw wa samaaniyata ayyaamin husooman fataral qawma feehaa sar'aa ka annahum a'jaazu nakhlin khaawiyah
ayah.translation: Which Allah imposed upon them for seven nights and eight days in succession, so you would see the people therein fallen as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees.

ayah.transliteration: Fahal taraa lahum mim baaqiyah
ayah.translation: Then do you see of them any remains?

ayah.transliteration: Wa jaaa'a Firawnu wa man qablahoo wal mu'tafikaatu bilhaati'ah
ayah.translation: And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin.

ayah.transliteration: Fa'ansaw Rasoola Rabbihim fa akhazahum akhzatar raabiyah
ayah.translation: And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding [in severity].

ayah.transliteration: Innaa lammaa taghal maaa'u hamalnaakum fil jaariyah
ayah.translation: Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship

ayah.transliteration: Linaj'alahaa lakum tazki ratanw-wa ta'iyahaa unzununw waa'iyah
ayah.translation: That We might make it for you a reminder and [that] a conscious ear would be conscious of it.

ayah.transliteration: Fa izaa nufikha fis soori nafkhatunw waahidah
ayah.translation: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast

ayah.transliteration: Wa humilatil ardu wal jibaalu fadukkataa dakkatanw waahidah
ayah.translation: And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow -

ayah.transliteration: Fa yawma'izinw waqa'atil waaqi'ah
ayah.translation: Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur,

ayah.transliteration: Wanshaqqatis samaaa'u fahiya yawma 'izinw-waahiyah
ayah.translation: And the heaven will split [open], for that Day it is infirm.

ayah.transliteration: Wal malaku 'alaaa arjaaa'ihaa; wa yahmilu 'Arsha Rabbika fawqahum yawma'izin samaaniyah
ayah.translation: And the angels are at its edges. And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day, eight [of them].

ayah.transliteration: Yawma'izin tu'radoona laa takhfaa min kum khaafiyah
ayah.translation: That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed.

ayah.transliteration: Fa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo biyameenihee fa yaqoolu haaa'umuq ra'oo kitaabiyah
ayah.translation: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record!

ayah.transliteration: Innee zannantu annee mulaaqin hisaabiyah
ayah.translation: Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account."

ayah.transliteration: Fahuwa fee 'eeshatir raadiyah
ayah.translation: So he will be in a pleasant life -

ayah.transliteration: Fee jannnatin 'aaliyah
ayah.translation: In an elevated garden,

ayah.transliteration: Qutoofuhaa daaniyah
ayah.translation: Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near.

ayah.transliteration: Kuloo washraboo haneee'am bimaaa aslaftum fil ayyaamil khaliyah
ayah.translation: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you put forth in the days past."

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo bishimaalihee fa yaqoolu yaalaitanee lam oota kitaaabiyah
ayah.translation: But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "Oh, I wish I had not been given my record

ayah.transliteration: Wa lam adri maa hisaabiyah
ayah.translation: And had not known what is my account.

ayah.transliteration: Yaa laitahaa kaanatil qaadiyah
ayah.translation: I wish my death had been the decisive one.

ayah.transliteration: Maaa aghnaa 'annee maaliyah
ayah.translation: My wealth has not availed me.

ayah.transliteration: Halaka 'annee sultaaniyah
ayah.translation: Gone from me is my authority."

ayah.transliteration: Khuzoohu faghullooh
ayah.translation: [Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him.

ayah.transliteration: Summal Jaheema sallooh
ayah.translation: Then into Hellfire drive him.

ayah.transliteration: Summa fee silsilatin zar'uhaa sab'oona ziraa'an faslukooh
ayah.translation: Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him."

ayah.transliteration: Innahoo kaana laa yu'minubillaahil 'Azeem
ayah.translation: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great,

ayah.transliteration: wa laa yahuddu 'alaa ta'aamil miskeen
ayah.translation: Nor did he encourage the feeding of the poor.

ayah.transliteration: Falaysa lahul yawma haahunaa hameem
ayah.translation: So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend

ayah.transliteration: Wa laa ta'aamun illaa min ghisleen
ayah.translation: Nor any food except from the discharge of wounds;

ayah.transliteration: Laa yaakuluhooo illal khati'oon
ayah.translation: None will eat it except the sinners.

ayah.transliteration: Falaaa uqsimu bimaa tubsiroon
ayah.translation: So I swear by what you see

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa laa tubsiroon
ayah.translation: And what you do not see

ayah.transliteration: Innahoo laqawlu Rasoolin kareem
ayah.translation: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is the word of a noble Messenger.

ayah.transliteration: Wa ma huwa biqawli shaa'ir; qaleelam maa tu'minoon
ayah.translation: And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe.

ayah.transliteration: Wa laa biqawli kaahin; qaleelam maa tazakkaroon
ayah.translation: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember.

ayah.transliteration: Tanzeelum mir rabbil 'aalameen
ayah.translation: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.

ayah.transliteration: Wa law taqawwala 'alainaa ba'dal aqaaweel
ayah.translation: And if Muhammad had made up about Us some [false] sayings,

ayah.transliteration: La-akhaznaa minhu bilyameen
ayah.translation: We would have seized him by the right hand;

ayah.transliteration: Summa laqata'naa minhul wateen
ayah.translation: Then We would have cut from him the aorta.

ayah.transliteration: Famaa minkum min ahadin'anhu haajizeen
ayah.translation: And there is no one of you who could prevent [Us] from him.

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahoo latazkiratul lilmuttaqeen
ayah.translation: And indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder for the righteous.

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna lana'lamu anna minkum mukazzibeen
ayah.translation: And indeed, We know that among you are deniers.

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahu lahasratun 'alal kaafireen
ayah.translation: And indeed, it will be [a cause of] regret upon the disbelievers.

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahoo lahaqqul yaqeen
ayah.translation: And indeed, it is the truth of certainty.

ayah.transliteration: Fasbbih bismi Rabbikal 'Azeem
ayah.translation: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

ayah.transliteration: Sa ala saaa'ilum bi'azaa binw-waaqi'
ayah.translation: A supplicant asked for a punishment bound to happen

ayah.transliteration: Lilkaafireen laisa lahoo daafi'
ayah.translation: To the disbelievers; of it there is no preventer.

ayah.transliteration: Minal laahi zil ma'aarij
ayah.translation: [It is] from Allah, owner of the ways of ascent.

ayah.transliteration: Ta'rujul malaaa'ikatu war Roohu ilaihi fee yawmin kaana miqdaaruhoo khamseena alfa sanah
ayah.translation: The angels and the Spirit will ascend to Him during a Day the extent of which is fifty thousand years.

ayah.transliteration: Fasbir ssabran jameelaa
ayah.translation: So be patient with gracious patience.

ayah.transliteration: Inaahum yarawnahoo ba'eedaa
ayah.translation: Indeed, they see it [as] distant,

ayah.transliteration: Wa naraahu qareebaa
ayah.translation: But We see it [as] near.

ayah.transliteration: Yawma takoonus samaaa'u kalmuhl
ayah.translation: On the Day the sky will be like murky oil,

ayah.transliteration: Wa takoonul jibaalu kal'ihn
ayah.translation: And the mountains will be like wool,

ayah.transliteration: Wa laa yas'alu hameemun hameemaa
ayah.translation: And no friend will ask [anything of] a friend,

ayah.transliteration: Yubassaroonahum; ya waddul mujrimu law yaftadee min 'azaabi yawma'izim bibaneeh
ayah.translation: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish that he could be ransomed from the punishment of that Day by his children

ayah.transliteration: Wa saahibatihee wa akheeh
ayah.translation: And his wife and his brother

ayah.transliteration: Wa faseelathil latee tu'weeh
ayah.translation: And his nearest kindred who shelter him

ayah.transliteration: Wa man fil ardi jamee'an summa yunjeeh
ayah.translation: And whoever is on earth entirely [so] then it could save him.

ayah.transliteration: Kallaa innahaa lazaa
ayah.translation: No! Indeed, it is the Flame [of Hell],

ayah.transliteration: Nazzaa'atal lishshawaa
ayah.translation: A remover of exteriors.

ayah.transliteration: Tad'oo man adbara wa tawallaa
ayah.translation: It invites he who turned his back [on truth] and went away [from obedience]

ayah.transliteration: W jama'a fa aw'aa
ayah.translation: And collected [wealth] and hoarded.

ayah.transliteration: Innal insaana khuliqa haloo'aa
ayah.translation: Indeed, mankind was created anxious:

ayah.transliteration: Izaa massahush sharru jazoo'aa
ayah.translation: When evil touches him, impatient,

ayah.transliteration: Wa izaa massahul khairu manoo'aa
ayah.translation: And when good touches him, withholding [of it],

ayah.transliteration: Illal musalleen
ayah.translation: Except the observers of prayer -

ayah.transliteration: Allazeena hum 'alaa Salaatihim daaa'imoon
ayah.translation: Those who are constant in their prayer

ayah.transliteration: Wallazeena feee amwaalihim haqqum ma'loom
ayah.translation: And those within whose wealth is a known right

ayah.transliteration: Lissaaa 'ili walmahroom
ayah.translation: For the petitioner and the deprived -

ayah.transliteration: Wallazeena yusaddiqoona bi yawmid Deen
ayah.translation: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense

ayah.transliteration: Wallazeena hum min 'azaabi Rabbihim mushfiqoon
ayah.translation: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord -

ayah.transliteration: Inna 'azaaba Rabbihim ghairu maamoon
ayah.translation: Indeed, the punishment of their Lord is not that from which one is safe -

ayah.transliteration: Wallazeena hum lifuroo jihim haafizoon
ayah.translation: And those who guard their private parts

ayah.transliteration: Illaa 'alaaa azwaajihim aw maa malakat aymaanuhum fainnahum ghairu maloomeen
ayah.translation: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they are not to be blamed -

ayah.transliteration: Famanib taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa ulaaa'ika humul 'aadoon
ayah.translation: But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors -

ayah.transliteration: Wallazeena hum li amaa naatihim wa 'ahdihim raa'oon
ayah.translation: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive

ayah.transliteration: Wallazeena hum bishahaadaatihim qaaa'imoon
ayah.translation: And those who are in their testimonies upright

ayah.transliteration: Wallazeena hum 'alaa salaatihim yuhaafizoon
ayah.translation: And those who [carefully] maintain their prayer:

ayah.transliteration: Ulaaa'ika fee jannaatim mukramoon
ayah.translation: They will be in gardens, honored.

ayah.transliteration: Famaa lil lazeena kafaroo qibalaka muhti'een
ayah.translation: So what is [the matter] with those who disbelieve, hastening [from] before you, [O Muhammad],

ayah.transliteration: 'Anil yameeni wa 'anish shimaali 'izeen
ayah.translation: [To sit] on [your] right and [your] left in separate groups?

ayah.transliteration: Ayatma'u kullum ri'im minhum anyyudkhala jannata Na'eem
ayah.translation: Does every person among them aspire to enter a garden of pleasure?

ayah.transliteration: Kallaaa innaa khalaq nahum mimmaa ya'lamoon
ayah.translation: No! Indeed, We have created them from that which they know.

ayah.transliteration: Falaaa uqsimu bi Rabbil mashaariqi wal maghaaribi innaa laqaadiroon
ayah.translation: So I swear by the Lord of [all] risings and settings that indeed We are able

ayah.transliteration: 'Alaaa an nubaddila khairam minhum wa maa Nahnu bimasbooqeen
ayah.translation: To replace them with better than them; and We are not to be outdone.

ayah.transliteration: Fazarhum yakhoodoo wa yal'aboo hattaa yulaaqoo yaw mahumul lazee yoo'adoon
ayah.translation: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised -

ayah.transliteration: Yawma yakhrujoona minal ajdaasi siraa'an ka anna hum ilaa nusubiny yoofidoon
ayah.translation: The Day they will emerge from the graves rapidly as if they were, toward an erected idol, hastening.

ayah.transliteration: Khaashi'atan absaaruhum tarhaquhum zillah; zaalikal yawmul lazee kaanoo yoo'adoon
ayah.translation: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. That is the Day which they had been promised.

ayah.transliteration: Innaaa arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee an anzir qawmaka min qabli any yaatiyahum 'azaabun aleem
ayah.translation: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."

ayah.transliteration: Qaala yaa qawmi innee lakum nazeerum mubeen
ayah.translation: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner,

ayah.transliteration: Ani'udul laaha watta qoohu wa atee'oon
ayah.translation: [Saying], 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me.

ayah.transliteration: Yaghfir lakum min zunoobikum wa yu'akhkhirkum ilaaa ajalim musammaa; innaa ajalal laahi izaa jaaa'a laa yu'akhkhar; law kuntum ta'lamoon
ayah.translation: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allah, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew.' "

ayah.transliteration: Qaala rabbi innee da'awtu qawmee lailanw wa naharaa
ayah.translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.

ayah.transliteration: Falam yazid hum du'aaa 'eee illaa firaaraa
ayah.translation: But my invitation increased them not except in flight.

ayah.transliteration: Wa inee kullamaa da'awtuhum litaghfira lahum ja'alooo asaabi'ahum fee aazaanihim wastaghshaw siyaabahum wa asaarroo wastakbarus tikbaaraa
ayah.translation: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.

ayah.transliteration: Summa innee da'aw tuhum jihaara
ayah.translation: Then I invited them publicly.

ayah.transliteration: Summaa inneee a'lantu lahum wa asrartu lahum israaraa
ayah.translation: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

ayah.transliteration: Faqultus taghfiroo Rabakam innahoo kaana Ghaffaaraa
ayah.translation: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.

ayah.transliteration: Yursilis samaaa'a 'alaikum midraaraa
ayah.translation: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

ayah.transliteration: Wa yumdidkum bi am waalinw wa baneena wa yaj'al lakum Jannaatinw wa yaj'al lakum anhaaraa
ayah.translation: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.

ayah.transliteration: Maa lakum laa tarjoona lillaahi waqaaraa
ayah.translation: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur

ayah.transliteration: Wa qad khalaqakum at waaraa
ayah.translation: While He has created you in stages?

ayah.transliteration: Alam taraw kaifa khalaqal laahu sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqaa
ayah.translation: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja'alal qamara feehinna nooranw wa ja'alash shamsa siraajaa
ayah.translation: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?

ayah.transliteration: Wallaahu ambatakum minal ardi nabaataa
ayah.translation: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.

ayah.transliteration: Summa yu'eedukum feehaa wa ukhrijukum ikhraajaa
ayah.translation: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.

ayah.transliteration: Wallaahu ja'ala lakumul arda bisaataa
ayah.translation: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse

ayah.transliteration: Litaslukoo minhaa subulan fijaajaa
ayah.translation: That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "

ayah.transliteration: Qaala Noohur Robbi innahum 'asawnee wattaba'oo mal lam yazid hu maaluhoo wa waladuhooo illaa khasaara
ayah.translation: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.

ayah.transliteration: Wa makaroo makran kubbaaraa
ayah.translation: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.

ayah.transliteration: Wa qaaloo laa tazarunna aalihatakum wa laa tazarunna Waddanw wa laa Suwaa'anw wa laa Yaghoosa wa Ya'ooqa wa Nasraa
ayah.translation: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.

ayah.transliteration: Wa qad adalloo kasee ranw wa laa tazidiz zaalimeena illaa dalaalaa
ayah.translation: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."

ayah.transliteration: Mimmaa khateee' aatihim ughriqoo fa udkhiloo Naaran falam yajidoo lahum min doonil laahi ansaaraa
ayah.translation: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.

ayah.transliteration: Wa qaala Noohur Rabbi laa tazar 'alal ardi minal kaafireena daiyaaraa
ayah.translation: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.

ayah.transliteration: Innaka in tazarhum yudil loo 'ibaadaka wa laa yalidooo illaa faajiran kaffaaraa
ayah.translation: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.

ayah.transliteration: Rabbigh fir lee wa liwaa lidaiya wa liman dakhala baitiya mu'minanw wa lil mu'mineena wal mu'minaati wa laa tazidiz zaalimeena illaa tabaaraa
ayah.translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."

ayah.transliteration: Qul oohiya ilaiya annna hustama'a nafarum minal jinnni faqaalooo innaa sami'naa quraanan 'ajabaa
ayah.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an.

ayah.transliteration: Yahdeee ilar rushdi fa aamannaa bihee wa lan nushrika bi rabbinaaa ahadaa
ayah.translation: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahoo Ta'aalaa jaddu Rabbinaa mat takhaza saahibatanw wa la waladaa
ayah.translation: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahoo kaana yaqoolu safeehunaa 'alal laahi shatataa
ayah.translation: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression.

ayah.transliteration: Wa annaa zanannaaa al lan taqoolal insu wal jinnu 'alal laahi kazibaa
ayah.translation: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie.

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahoo kaana rijaa lum minal insi ya'oozoona birijaalim minal jinni fazaa doohum rahaqaa
ayah.translation: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden.

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahum zannoo kamaa zanantum al lany yab'asal laahu ahadaa
ayah.translation: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger].

ayah.transliteration: Wa annaa lamasnas sa maaa'a fa wajadnaahaa muli'at harasan shadeedanw wa shuhubaa
ayah.translation: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.

ayah.transliteration: Wa annaa kunnaa naq'udu minhaa maqaa'ida lis'sam'i famany yastami'il aana yajid lahoo shihaabar rasada
ayah.translation: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him.

ayah.transliteration: Wa annaa laa nadreee asharrun ureeda biman fil ardi am araada bihim rabbuhum rashadaa
ayah.translation: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.

ayah.transliteration: Wa annaa minnas saalihoona wa minnaa doona zaalika kunnaa taraaa'ilqa qidadaa
ayah.translation: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways.

ayah.transliteration: Wa annaa zanannaaa al lan nu'jizal laaha fil ardi wa lan nu'jizahoo harabaa
ayah.translation: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.

ayah.transliteration: Wa annaa lammaa sami'nal hudaaa aamannaa bihee famany yu'mim bi rabbihee falaa yakhaafu bakhsanw wa laa rahaqaa
ayah.translation: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden.

ayah.transliteration: Wa annaa minnal muslimoona wa minnal qaasitoona faman aslama fa ulaaa'ika taharraw rashadaa
ayah.translation: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course.

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammal qaasitoona fa kaanoo li jahannama hatabaa
ayah.translation: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood.'

ayah.transliteration: Wa alla wis taqaamoo 'alat tareeqati la asqaynaahum maa'an ghadaqaa
ayah.translation: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision

ayah.transliteration: Linaftinahum feeh; wa many yu'rid 'an zikri rabbihee yasluk hu 'azaaban sa'adaa
ayah.translation: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment.

ayah.transliteration: Wa annal masaajida lillaahi falaa tad'oo ma'al laahi ahadaa
ayah.translation: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahoo lammaa qaama 'adul laahi yad'oohu kaadoo yakoonoona 'alaihi libadaa
ayah.translation: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."

ayah.transliteration: Qul innamaaa ad'oo rabbee wa laaa ushriku biheee ahadaa
ayah.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."

ayah.transliteration: Qul innee laaa amliku lakum darranw wa laa rashadaa
ayah.translation: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."

ayah.transliteration: Qul innee lany yujeeranee minal laahi ahad, wa lan ajida min doonihee multahadaa
ayah.translation: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.

ayah.transliteration: Illaa balaagham minal laahi wa risaalaatih; wa many ya'sil laaha wa rasoolahoo fa inna lahoo naara jahannama khaalideena feehaaa abadaa
ayah.translation: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.

ayah.transliteration: Hattaaa izaa ra aw maa yoo'adoona fasaya'lamoona man ad'afu naasiranw wa aqallu 'adadaa
ayah.translation: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number.

ayah.transliteration: Qul in adreee a qareebum maa too'adoona am yaj'alu lahoo rabbeee amadaa
ayah.translation: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."

ayah.transliteration: 'Aalimul ghaibi falaa yuzhiru alaa ghaibiheee ahadaa
ayah.translation: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone

ayah.transliteration: Illaa manir tadaa mir rasoolin fa innahoo yasluku mim baini yadihi wa min khalfihee rasadaa
ayah.translation: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers

ayah.transliteration: Liya'lama an qad ablaghoo risaalaati rabbihim wa ahaata bima ladihim wa ahsaa kulla shai'in 'adadaa
ayah.translation: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.

ayah.transliteration: Yaw ayyuhal muzzammil
ayah.translation: O you who wraps himself [in clothing],

ayah.transliteration: Qumil laila illaa qaleelaa
ayah.translation: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little -

ayah.transliteration: Nisfahooo awinqus minhu qaleelaa
ayah.translation: Half of it - or subtract from it a little

ayah.transliteration: Aw zid 'alaihi wa rattilil Qur'aana tarteela
ayah.translation: Or add to it, and recite the Qur'an with measured recitation.

ayah.transliteration: Innaa sanulqee 'alika qawalan saqeelaa
ayah.translation: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word.

ayah.transliteration: Inn naashi'atal laili hiya ashadddu wat anw wa aqwamu qeelaa
ayah.translation: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence [of heart and tongue] and more suitable for words.

ayah.transliteration: Inna laka fin nahaari sabhan taweelaa
ayah.translation: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation.

ayah.transliteration: Wazkuris ma rabbika wa tabattal ilaihi tabteelaa
ayah.translation: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion.

ayah.transliteration: Rabbul mashriqi wal maghriibi laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fattakhizhu wakeelaa
ayah.translation: [He is] the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of [your] affairs.

ayah.transliteration: Wasbir 'alaa maa yaqoo loona wahjurhum hajran jameelaa
ayah.translation: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance.

ayah.transliteration: Wa zarnee walmukaz zibeena ulin na'mati wa mahhilhum qaleelaa
ayah.translation: And leave Me with [the matter of] the deniers, those of ease [in life], and allow them respite a little.

ayah.transliteration: Inna ladainaaa ankaalanw wa jaheemaa
ayah.translation: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire

ayah.transliteration: Wa ta'aaman zaa ghussa tinw wa'azaaban aleemaa
ayah.translation: And food that chokes and a painful punishment -

ayah.transliteration: Yawma tarjuful ardu waljibaalu wa kaanatil jibaalu kaseebam maheelaa
ayah.translation: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down.

ayah.transliteration: Innaa arsalnaaa ilaikum rasoolan shahidan 'alikum kamaaa arsalnaaa ilaa Fir'awna Rasoolna
ayah.translation: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.

ayah.transliteration: Fa'asaa Fir'awnur Rasoola fa akhaznaahu akhzanw wabeelaa
ayah.translation: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure.

ayah.transliteration: Fakaifa tattaqoona in kafartum yawmany yaj'alul wildaana sheeba
ayah.translation: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white- haired?

ayah.transliteration: Assamaaa'u munfatirum bih; kaana wa'duhoo maf'oola
ayah.translation: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled.

ayah.transliteration: Inna haazihee tazkiratun fa man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa Rabbihee sabeelaa
ayah.translation: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way.

ayah.transliteration: Inna Rabbaka ya'lamu annaka taqoomu adnaa min sulusa yil laili wa nisfahoo wa sulusahoo wa taaa'ifatum minal lazeena ma'ak; wal laahu yuqaddirul laila wanna haar; 'alima al lan tuhsoohu fataaba 'alaikum faqra'oo maa tayassara minal quraan; 'alima an sa yakoonu minkum mardaa wa aakharoona yadriboona fil ardi yabtaghoona min fadlil laahi wa aakharoona yuqaatiloona fee sabeelil laahi faqra'oo ma tayassara minhu wa aqeemus salaata wa aatuz zakaata wa aqridul laaha qardan hasanaa; wa maa tuqadimoo li anfusikum min khairin tajidoohu 'indal laahi huwa khayranw wa a'zama ajraa; wastaghfirul laahaa innal laaha ghafoorur raheem.
ayah.translation: Indeed, your Lord knows, [O Muhammad], that you stand [in prayer] almost two thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and [so do] a group of those with you. And Allah determines [the extent of] the night and the day. He has known that you [Muslims] will not be able to do it and has turned to you in forgiveness, so recite what is easy [for you] of the Qur'an. He has known that there will be among you those who are ill and others traveling throughout the land seeking [something] of the bounty of Allah and others fighting for the cause of Allah. So recite what is easy from it and establish prayer and give zakah and loan Allah a goodly loan. And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah. It is better and greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

ayah.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhal muddassir
ayah.translation: O you who covers himself [with a garment],

ayah.transliteration: Qum fa anzir
ayah.translation: Arise and warn

ayah.transliteration: Wa rabbaka fakabbir
ayah.translation: And your Lord glorify

ayah.transliteration: Wa siyaabaka fatahhir
ayah.translation: And your clothing purify

ayah.transliteration: Warrujza fahjur
ayah.translation: And uncleanliness avoid

ayah.transliteration: Wa laa tamnun tastaksir
ayah.translation: And do not confer favor to acquire more

ayah.transliteration: Wa li Rabbika fasbir
ayah.translation: But for your Lord be patient.

ayah.transliteration: Fa izaa nuqira fin naaqoor
ayah.translation: And when the trumpet is blown,

ayah.transliteration: Fazaalika yawma 'iziny yawmun 'aseer
ayah.translation: That Day will be a difficult day

ayah.transliteration: 'Alal kaafireena ghayru yaseer
ayah.translation: For the disbelievers - not easy.

ayah.transliteration: Zamee wa man khalaqtu waheedaa
ayah.translation: Leave Me with the one I created alone

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja'altu lahoo maalam mamdoodaa
ayah.translation: And to whom I granted extensive wealth

ayah.transliteration: Wa baneena shuhoodaa
ayah.translation: And children present [with him]

ayah.transliteration: Wa mahhattu lahoo tamheeda
ayah.translation: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life].

ayah.transliteration: Summa yat ma'u an azeed
ayah.translation: Then he desires that I should add more.

ayah.transliteration: Kallaaa innahoo kaana li Aayaatinaa 'aneedaa
ayah.translation: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate.

ayah.transliteration: Sa urhiquhoo sa'oodaa
ayah.translation: I will cover him with arduous torment.

ayah.transliteration: Innahoo fakkara wa qaddar
ayah.translation: Indeed, he thought and deliberated.

ayah.transliteration: Faqutila kayfa qaddar
ayah.translation: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

ayah.transliteration: Summa qutila kaifa qaddar
ayah.translation: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

ayah.transliteration: Summa nazar
ayah.translation: Then he considered [again];

ayah.transliteration: Summa 'abasa wa basar
ayah.translation: Then he frowned and scowled;

ayah.transliteration: Summaa adbara wastakbar
ayah.translation: Then he turned back and was arrogant

ayah.transliteration: Faqaala in haazaaa illaa sihruny yu'sar
ayah.translation: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].

ayah.transliteration: In haazaaa illaa qawlul bashar
ayah.translation: This is not but the word of a human being."

ayah.transliteration: Sa usleehi saqar
ayah.translation: I will drive him into Saqar.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maaa adraaka maa saqar
ayah.translation: And what can make you know what is Saqar?

ayah.transliteration: Laa tubqee wa laa tazar
ayah.translation: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned],

ayah.transliteration: Lawwaahatul lilbashar
ayah.translation: Blackening the skins.

ayah.transliteration: 'Alaihaa tis'ata 'ashar
ayah.translation: Over it are nineteen [angels].

ayah.transliteration: Wa maaja''alnaaa As haaban naari illaa malaaa 'ikatanw wa maa ja'alnaa 'iddatahum illaa fitnatal lillazeena kafaroo liyastayqinal lazeena ootul kitaaba wa yazdaadal lazeena aamanooo eemaananw wa laa yartaabal lazeena ootul kitaaba walmu'minoona wa liyaqoolal lazeena fee quloo bihim maradunw walkaafiroona maazaaa araadal laahu bihaazaa masalaa; kazaalika yudillul laahu many yashaaa'u wa yahdee many yashaaa'; wa maa ya'lamu junooda rabbika illaa hoo; wa maa hiya illaa zikraa lil bashar
ayah.translation: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity.

ayah.transliteration: Kallaa walqamar
ayah.translation: No! By the moon

ayah.transliteration: Wallaili adbar
ayah.translation: And [by] the night when it departs

ayah.transliteration: Wassub hi izaaa asfar
ayah.translation: And [by] the morning when it brightens,

ayah.transliteration: Innahaa la ihdal kubar
ayah.translation: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]

ayah.transliteration: Nazeeral lilbashar
ayah.translation: As a warning to humanity -

ayah.transliteration: Liman shaaa'a minkum any yataqaddama aw yata akhkhar
ayah.translation: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.

ayah.transliteration: Kullu nafsim bim kasabat raheenah
ayah.translation: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained

ayah.transliteration: Illaaa as haabal yameen
ayah.translation: Except the companions of the right,

ayah.transliteration: Fee jannaatiny yata saaa'aloon
ayah.translation: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other

ayah.transliteration: 'Anil mujrimeen
ayah.translation: About the criminals,

ayah.transliteration: Maa salakakum fee saqar
ayah.translation: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"

ayah.transliteration: Qaaloo lam naku minal musalleen
ayah.translation: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,

ayah.transliteration: Wa lam naku nut'imul miskeen
ayah.translation: Nor did we used to feed the poor.

ayah.transliteration: Wa kunnaa nakhoodu ma'al khaaa'ideen
ayah.translation: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],

ayah.transliteration: Wa kunnaa nukazzibu bi yawmid Deen
ayah.translation: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense

ayah.transliteration: Hattaaa ataanal yaqeen
ayah.translation: Until there came to us the certainty."

ayah.transliteration: Famaa tanfa'uhum shafaa'atush shaafi'een
ayah.translation: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.

ayah.transliteration: Famaa lahum 'anittazkirati mu'rideen
ayah.translation: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away

ayah.transliteration: Ka annahum humurum mustanfirah
ayah.translation: As if they were alarmed donkeys

ayah.transliteration: Farrat min qaswarah
ayah.translation: Fleeing from a lion?

ayah.transliteration: Bal yureedu kullum ri'im minhum any yu'taa suhufam munashsharah
ayah.translation: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.

ayah.transliteration: Kallaa bal laa yakhaafoonal aakhirah
ayah.translation: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.

ayah.transliteration: Kallaaa innahoo tazkirah
ayah.translation: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder

ayah.transliteration: Fa man shaaa'a zakarah
ayah.translation: Then whoever wills will remember it.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa yazkuroona illaaa any yashaaa'al laah; Huwa ahlut taqwaa wa ahlul maghfirah
ayah.translation: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.

ayah.transliteration: Laaa uqsimu bi yawmil qiyaamah
ayah.translation: I swear by the Day of Resurrection

ayah.transliteration: Wa laaa uqsimu bin nafsil lawwaamah
ayah.translation: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection].

ayah.transliteration: Ayahsabul insaanu al lan najm'a 'izaamah
ayah.translation: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones?

ayah.transliteration: Balaa qaadireena 'alaaa an nusawwiya banaanah
ayah.translation: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips.

ayah.transliteration: Bal yureedul insaanu liyafjura amaamah
ayah.translation: But man desires to continue in sin.

ayah.transliteration: Yas'alu ayyyaana yawmul qiyaamah
ayah.translation: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"

ayah.transliteration: Fa izaa bariqal basar
ayah.translation: So when vision is dazzled

ayah.transliteration: We khasafal qamar
ayah.translation: And the moon darkens

ayah.transliteration: Wa jumi'ash shamusu wal qamar
ayah.translation: And the sun and the moon are joined,

ayah.transliteration: Yaqoolul insaanu yaw ma 'izin aynal mafarr
ayah.translation: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape?"

ayah.transliteration: Kallaa laa wazar
ayah.translation: No! There is no refuge.

ayah.transliteration: Ilaa rabbika yawma 'izinil mustaqarr
ayah.translation: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence.

ayah.transliteration: Yunabba 'ul insaanu yawma 'izim bimaa qaddama wa akhkhar
ayah.translation: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back.

ayah.transliteration: Balil insaanu 'alaa nafsihee baseerah
ayah.translation: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness,

ayah.transliteration: Wa law alqaa ma'aazeerah
ayah.translation: Even if he presents his excuses.

ayah.transliteration: Laa tuharrik bihee lisaa naka lita'jala bih
ayah.translation: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muhammad], to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an.

ayah.transliteration: Inna 'alainaa jam'ahoo wa qur aanah
ayah.translation: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.

ayah.transliteration: Fa izaa qaraanaahu fattabi' qur aanah
ayah.translation: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.

ayah.transliteration: Summa inna 'alainaa bayaanah
ayah.translation: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].

ayah.transliteration: Kallaa bal tuhibboonal 'aajilah
ayah.translation: No! But you love the immediate

ayah.transliteration: Wa tazaroonal Aakhirah
ayah.translation: And leave the Hereafter.

ayah.transliteration: Wujoohuny yawma 'izin naadirah
ayah.translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant,

ayah.transliteration: Ilaa rabbihaa naazirah
ayah.translation: Looking at their Lord.

ayah.transliteration: Wa wujoohuny yawma 'izim baasirah
ayah.translation: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted,

ayah.transliteration: Tazunnu any yuf'ala bihaa faaqirah
ayah.translation: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking.

ayah.transliteration: Kallaaa izaa balaghatit taraaqee
ayah.translation: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones

ayah.transliteration: Wa qeela man raaq
ayah.translation: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]?"

ayah.transliteration: Wa zanna annahul firaaq
ayah.translation: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation

ayah.transliteration: Waltaffatis saaqu bissaaq
ayah.translation: And the leg is wound about the leg,

ayah.transliteration: Ilaa rabbika yawma'izinil masaaq
ayah.translation: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession.

ayah.transliteration: Falaa saddaqa wa laa sallaa
ayah.translation: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed.

ayah.transliteration: Wa laakin kazzaba wa tawalla
ayah.translation: But [instead], he denied and turned away.

ayah.transliteration: Summa zahaba ilaaa ahlihee yatamatta
ayah.translation: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride].

ayah.transliteration: Awlaa laka fa awlaa
ayah.translation: Woe to you, and woe!

ayah.transliteration: Summa awlaa laka fa awla
ayah.translation: Then woe to you, and woe!

ayah.transliteration: Ayahsabul insaanu anyytraka sudaa
ayah.translation: Does man think that he will be left neglected?

ayah.transliteration: Alam yaku nutfatam mim maniyyiny yumnaa
ayah.translation: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?

ayah.transliteration: Summa kaana 'alaqata fakhalaq fasawwaa
ayah.translation: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]

ayah.transliteration: Faja'ala minhuz zawjayniz zakara wal unsaa
ayah.translation: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.

ayah.transliteration: Alaisa zaalika biqaadirin 'alaaa any yuhyiyal mawtaa
ayah.translation: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead?

ayah.transliteration: Hal ataa 'alal insaani heenum minad dahri lam yakun shai'am mazkooraa
ayah.translation: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?

ayah.transliteration: Innaa khalaqnal insaana min nutfatin amshaajin nabta leehi faja'alnaahu samee'am baseeraa
ayah.translation: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.

ayah.transliteration: Innaa hadainaahus sabeela immaa shaakiranw wa immaa kafoora
ayah.translation: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.

ayah.transliteration: Innaaa a'tadnaa lilkaa fireena salaasila wa aghlaalanw wa sa'eeraa
ayah.translation: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.

ayah.transliteration: innal abraara yashra boona min kaasin kaana mizaa juhaa kaafooraa
ayah.translation: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur,

ayah.transliteration: 'Aynany yashrabu bihaa 'ibaadul laahi yafajjiroonahaa tafjeeraa
ayah.translation: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].

ayah.transliteration: Yoofoona binnazri wa yakhaafoona yawman kaana sharruhoo mustateeraa
ayah.translation: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.

ayah.transliteration: Wa yut''imoonat ta'aama 'alaa hubbihee miskeenanw wa yatemanw wa aseeraa
ayah.translation: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,

ayah.transliteration: Innaamaa nut'imukum li wajhil laahi laa nureedu minkum jazaaa'anw wa laa shukooraa
ayah.translation: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.

ayah.transliteration: Innaa nakhaafu mir Rabbinna Yawman 'aboosan qamtareeraa
ayah.translation: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."

ayah.transliteration: Fa waqaahumul laahu sharra zaalikal yawmi wa laqqaahum nadratanw wa surooraa
ayah.translation: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness

ayah.transliteration: Wa jazaahum bimaa sabaroo janatanw wa hareeraa
ayah.translation: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].

ayah.transliteration: muttaki'eena feeha 'alal araaa 'iki laa yarawna feehaa shamsanw wa laa zamhareeraa
ayah.translation: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.

ayah.transliteration: Wa daaniyatan 'alaihim zilaaluhaa wa zullilat qutoofu haa tazleela
ayah.translation: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.

ayah.transliteration: Wa yutaafu 'alaihim bi aaniyatim min fiddatinw wa akwaabin kaanat qawaareeraa
ayah.translation: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],

ayah.transliteration: Qawaareera min fiddatin qaddaroohaa taqdeeraa
ayah.translation: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.

ayah.transliteration: Wa yusawna feehaa kaasan kaana mizaajuhaa zanjabeelaa
ayah.translation: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger

ayah.transliteration: 'Aynan feeha tusammaa salsabeelaa
ayah.translation: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel.

ayah.transliteration: Wa yatoofu 'alaihim wildaanum mukhalladoona izaa ra aytahum hasibtahum lu'lu 'am mansoora
ayah.translation: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.

ayah.transliteration: Wa izaa ra ayta summa ra ayta na'eemanw wa mulkan kabeera
ayah.translation: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.

ayah.transliteration: 'Aaliyahum siyaabu sundusin khudrunw wa istabraq, wa hullooo asaawira min fiddatinw wa saqaahum Rabbuhum sharaaban tahooraa
ayah.translation: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.

ayah.transliteration: Innaa haazaa kaana lakum jazz 'anw wa kaana sa'yukum mashkooraa
ayah.translation: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."

ayah.transliteration: Innaa nahnu nazzalnaa 'alaikal quraana tanzeelaa
ayah.translation: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.

ayah.transliteration: Fasbir lihukmi Rabbika wa laa tuti' minhum aasiman aw kafooraa
ayah.translation: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].

ayah.transliteration: Wazkuris ma Rabbika bukratanw wa aseelaa
ayah.translation: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening

ayah.transliteration: Wa minal laili fasjud lahoo wa sabbihhu lailan taweelaa
ayah.translation: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night.

ayah.transliteration: Inna haaa'ulaa'i yuhibboona 'aajilata wa yazaroona waraaa'ahum yawman saqeelaa
ayah.translation: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.

ayah.transliteration: Nahnu khalaqnaahum wa shadadnaaa asrahum wa izaa shi'naa baddalnaaa amsaala hum tabdeelaa
ayah.translation: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.

ayah.transliteration: Inna haazihee tazkiratun fa man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa rabbihee sabeela
ayah.translation: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa tashaaa'oona illaa anyyashaaa'al laah; innal laahaa kaana'Aleeman Hakeema
ayah.translation: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.

ayah.transliteration: Yudkhilu mai yashaaa'u fee rahmatih; wazzaalimeena a'adda lahum 'azaaban aleemaa
ayah.translation: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.

ayah.transliteration: Wal mursalaati'urfaa
ayah.translation: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts

ayah.transliteration: Fal'aasifaati 'asfaa
ayah.translation: And the winds that blow violently

ayah.transliteration: Wannaashiraati nashraa
ayah.translation: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]

ayah.transliteration: Falfaariqaati farqaa
ayah.translation: And those [angels] who bring criterion

ayah.transliteration: Falmulqiyaati zikra
ayah.translation: And those [angels] who deliver a message

ayah.transliteration: 'Uzran aw nuzraa
ayah.translation: As justification or warning,

ayah.transliteration: Innamaa too'adoona lawaaqi'
ayah.translation: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.

ayah.transliteration: Fa izam nujoomu tumisat
ayah.translation: So when the stars are obliterated

ayah.transliteration: Wa izas samaaa'u furijat
ayah.translation: And when the heaven is opened

ayah.transliteration: Wa izal jibaalu nusifat
ayah.translation: And when the mountains are blown away

ayah.transliteration: Wa izar Rusulu uqqitat
ayah.translation: And when the messengers' time has come...

ayah.transliteration: Li ayyi yawmin ujjilat
ayah.translation: For what Day was it postponed?

ayah.transliteration: Li yawmil Fasl
ayah.translation: For the Day of Judgement.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maaa adraaka maa yawmul fasl
ayah.translation: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?

ayah.transliteration: Wailuny yawma 'izillilmukazzibeen
ayah.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

ayah.transliteration: Alam nuhlikil awwaleen
ayah.translation: Did We not destroy the former peoples?

ayah.transliteration: Summa nutbi'uhumul aakhireen
ayah.translation: Then We will follow them with the later ones.

ayah.transliteration: Kazzlika naf'alu bilmujrimeen
ayah.translation: Thus do We deal with the criminals.

ayah.transliteration: Wailunw yawma 'izil lil mukazzibeen
