ayah.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

ayah.transliteration: Alam nakhlukkum mimmaaa'im maheen
ayah.translation: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained?

ayah.transliteration: Faja'alnaahu fee qaraarim makeen
ayah.translation: And We placed it in a firm lodging

ayah.transliteration: Illaa qadrim ma'loom
ayah.translation: For a known extent.

ayah.transliteration: Faqadarnaa fani'mal qaadiroon
ayah.translation: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine.

ayah.transliteration: Wailuny yawma 'izil lilmukazzibeen
ayah.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

ayah.transliteration: Alam naj'alil arda kifaataa
ayah.translation: Have We not made the earth a container

ayah.transliteration: Ahyaaa'anw wa amwaataa
ayah.translation: Of the living and the dead?

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja'alnaa feehaa rawaasiya shaamikhaatinw wa asqainaakum maaa'an furaataa
ayah.translation: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water.

ayah.transliteration: Wailuny yawma 'izil lilmukazzibeen
ayah.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

ayah.transliteration: Intaliqooo ilaa maa kuntum bihee tukazziboon
ayah.translation: [They will be told], "Proceed to that which you used to deny.

ayah.transliteration: Intaliqooo ilaa zillin zee salaasi shu'ab
ayah.translation: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns

ayah.transliteration: Laa zaleelinw wa laa yughnee minal lahab
ayah.translation: [But having] no cool shade and availing not against the flame."

ayah.transliteration: Innahaa tarmee bishararin kalqasr
ayah.translation: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress,

ayah.transliteration: Ka annahoo jimaalatun sufr
ayah.translation: As if they were yellowish [black] camels.

ayah.transliteration: Wailuny yawma 'izil lilmukazibeen
ayah.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

ayah.transliteration: Haazaa yawmu laa uantiqoon
ayah.translation: This is a Day they will not speak,

ayah.transliteration: Wa laa yu'zanu lahum fa ya'taziroon
ayah.translation: Nor will it be permitted for them to make an excuse.

ayah.transliteration: Wailunw yawma 'izil lilmukazzibeen
ayah.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

ayah.transliteration: Haaza yawmul fasli jama 'naakum wal awwaleen
ayah.translation: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples.

ayah.transliteration: Fa in kaana lakum kaidun fakeedoon
ayah.translation: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.

ayah.transliteration: Wailuny yawma'izil lilmukazzibeen
ayah.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

ayah.transliteration: Innal muttaqeena fee zilaalinw wa 'uyoon
ayah.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs

ayah.transliteration: Wa fawaakiha mimmaa yastahoon
ayah.translation: And fruits from whatever they desire,

ayah.transliteration: Kuloo washraboo haneee 'am bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
ayah.translation: [Being told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

ayah.transliteration: Innaa kazaalika najzil muhsineen
ayah.translation: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

ayah.transliteration: Wailuny yawma 'izil lilmuzkazzibeen
ayah.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

ayah.transliteration: Kuloo wa tamatta'oo qaleelan innakum mujrimoon
ayah.translation: [O disbelievers], eat and enjoy yourselves a little; indeed, you are criminals.

ayah.transliteration: Wailunny yawma 'izil lilmukazzibeen
ayah.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

ayah.transliteration: Wa izaa qeela lahumur ka'oo aa yarka'oon
ayah.translation: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.

ayah.transliteration: Wailunny yawma 'izil lilmukazzibeen
ayah.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

ayah.transliteration: Fabi ayyi hadeesim ba'dahoo yu'minoon
ayah.translation: Then in what statement after the Qur'an will they believe?

ayah.transliteration: 'Amma Yatasaa-aloon
ayah.translation: About what are they asking one another?

ayah.transliteration: 'Anin-nabaa-il 'azeem
ayah.translation: About the great news -

ayah.transliteration: Allazi hum feehi mukh talifoon
ayah.translation: That over which they are in disagreement.

ayah.transliteration: Kallaa sa y'alamoon
ayah.translation: No! They are going to know.

ayah.transliteration: Thumma kallaa sa y'alamoon
ayah.translation: Then, no! They are going to know.

ayah.transliteration: Alam naj'alil arda mihaa da
ayah.translation: Have We not made the earth a resting place?

ayah.transliteration: Wal jibaala au taada
ayah.translation: And the mountains as stakes?

ayah.transliteration: Wa khalaq naakum azwaaja
ayah.translation: And We created you in pairs

ayah.transliteration: Waja'alnan naumakum subata
ayah.translation: And made your sleep [a means for] rest

ayah.transliteration: Waja'alnal laila libasa
ayah.translation: And made the night as clothing

ayah.transliteration: Waja'alnan nahara ma 'aasha
ayah.translation: And made the day for livelihood

ayah.transliteration: Wa banaina fauqakum sab 'an shi daada
ayah.translation: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]

ayah.transliteration: Waja'alna siraajaw wah haaja
ayah.translation: And made [therein] a burning lamp

ayah.transliteration: Wa anzalna minal m'usiraati maa-an saj-jaaja
ayah.translation: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water

ayah.transliteration: Linukh rija bihee habbaw wana baata
ayah.translation: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation

ayah.transliteration: Wa jan naatin alfafa
ayah.translation: And gardens of entwined growth.

ayah.transliteration: Inna yaumal-fasli kana miqaata
ayah.translation: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yun fakhu fis-soori fataa toona afwaaja
ayah.translation: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes

ayah.transliteration: Wa futiha tis samaa-u fakaanat abwaaba
ayah.translation: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways

ayah.transliteration: Wa suyyi raatil jibaalu fa kaanat saraaba
ayah.translation: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.

ayah.transliteration: Inna jahan nama kaanat mirsaada
ayah.translation: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait

ayah.transliteration: Lit taa gheena ma aaba
ayah.translation: For the transgressors, a place of return,

ayah.transliteration: Laa bitheena feehaa ahqaaba
ayah.translation: In which they will remain for ages [unending].

ayah.transliteration: Laa ya zooqoona feeha bar daw walaa sharaaba
ayah.translation: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink

ayah.transliteration: Illa hamee maw-wa ghas saaqa
ayah.translation: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -

ayah.transliteration: Jazaa-aw wi faaqa
ayah.translation: An appropriate recompense.

ayah.transliteration: Innahum kaanu laa yarjoona hisaaba
ayah.translation: Indeed, they were not expecting an account

ayah.transliteration: Wa kazzabu bi aayaa tina kizzaba
ayah.translation: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.

ayah.transliteration: Wa kulla shai-in ahsai naahu kitaa ba
ayah.translation: But all things We have enumerated in writing.

ayah.transliteration: Fa zooqoo falan-nazee dakum ill-laa azaaba
ayah.translation: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."

ayah.transliteration: Inna lil mutta qeena mafaaza
ayah.translation: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -

ayah.transliteration: Hadaa-iqa wa a'anaa ba
ayah.translation: Gardens and grapevines

ayah.transliteration: Wa kaawa 'iba at raaba
ayah.translation: And full-breasted [companions] of equal age

ayah.transliteration: Wa ka'san di haaqa
ayah.translation: And a full cup.

ayah.transliteration: Laa yasma'oona fiha lagh waw walaa kizzaba
ayah.translation: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -

ayah.transliteration: Jazaa-am mir-rabbika ataa-an hisaaba
ayah.translation: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,

ayah.transliteration: Rabbis samaa waati wal ardi wa maa baina humar rahmaani laa yam likoona minhu khi taaba
ayah.translation: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech.

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yaqoo mur roohu wal malaa-ikatu saf-fal laa yata kalla moona illa man azina lahur rahmaanu wa qaala sawaaba
ayah.translation: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.

ayah.transliteration: Zaalikal yaumul haqqu faman shaa-at ta khaaza ill-laa rabbihi ma-aaba
ayah.translation: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.

ayah.transliteration: In naa anzar naakum azaaban qareebaiy-yauma yan zurul marr-u maa qaddamat yadaahu wa ya qoolul-kaafiru yaa lai tanee kuntu turaaba
ayah.translation: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"

ayah.transliteration: Wan naazi 'aati gharqa
ayah.translation: By those [angels] who extract with violence

ayah.transliteration: Wan naa shi taati nashta
ayah.translation: And [by] those who remove with ease

ayah.transliteration: Wass saabi-haati sabha
ayah.translation: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming

ayah.transliteration: Fass saabi qaati sabqa
ayah.translation: And those who race each other in a race

ayah.transliteration: Fal mu dab-bi raati amra
ayah.translation: And those who arrange [each] matter,

ayah.transliteration: Yawma tarjufur raajifa
ayah.translation: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],

ayah.transliteration: Tatba'u har raadifa
ayah.translation: There will follow it the subsequent [one].

ayah.transliteration: Quloobuny-yau maaiziw-waaji-fa
ayah.translation: Hearts, that Day, will tremble,

ayah.transliteration: Absaa ruhaa khashi'ah
ayah.translation: Their eyes humbled.

ayah.transliteration: Ya qoo loona a-inna lamar doo doona fil haafirah
ayah.translation: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]?

ayah.transliteration: Aizaa kunna 'izaa man-nakhirah
ayah.translation: Even if we should be decayed bones?

ayah.transliteration: Qaalu tilka izan karratun khaasirah.
ayah.translation: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."

ayah.transliteration: Fa inna ma hiya zajratuw-waahida
ayah.translation: Indeed, it will be but one shout,

ayah.transliteration: Faizaa hum biss saahirah
ayah.translation: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.

ayah.transliteration: Hal ataaka hadeethu Musaa
ayah.translation: Has there reached you the story of Moses? -

ayah.transliteration: Iz nadaahu rabbuhu bil waadil-muqad dasi tuwa
ayah.translation: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,

ayah.transliteration: Izhab ilaa fir'auna innahu taghaa.
ayah.translation: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.

ayah.transliteration: Faqul hal laka ilaa-an tazakka.
ayah.translation: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself

ayah.transliteration: Wa ahdi yaka ila rabbika fatakh sha
ayah.translation: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"

ayah.transliteration: Fa araahul-aayatal kubra.
ayah.translation: And he showed him the greatest sign,

ayah.transliteration: Fa kazzaba wa asaa.
ayah.translation: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed.

ayah.transliteration: Thumma adbara yas'aa.
ayah.translation: Then he turned his back, striving.

ayah.transliteration: Fa hashara fanada.
ayah.translation: And he gathered [his people] and called out

ayah.transliteration: Faqala ana rabbu kumul-a'laa.
ayah.translation: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."

ayah.transliteration: Fa-akha zahul laahu nakalal aakhirati wal-oola.
ayah.translation: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression].

ayah.transliteration: Inna fee zaalika la'ibratal limaiy-yaksha
ayah.translation: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah].

ayah.transliteration: A-antum a shaddu khalqan amis samaa-u banaaha.
ayah.translation: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.

ayah.transliteration: Raf'a sam kaha fasaw waaha
ayah.translation: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.

ayah.transliteration: Wa aghtasha lailaha wa akhraja duhaaha.
ayah.translation: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.

ayah.transliteration: Wal arda b'ada zaalika dahaaha.
ayah.translation: And after that He spread the earth.

ayah.transliteration: Akhraja minha maa-aha wa mar 'aaha.
ayah.translation: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,

ayah.transliteration: Wal jibala arsaaha.
ayah.translation: And the mountains He set firmly

ayah.transliteration: Mataa'al lakum wali an 'aamikum.
ayah.translation: As provision for you and your grazing livestock.

ayah.transliteration: Fa-izaa jaaa'atit taaam matul kubraa.
ayah.translation: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -

ayah.transliteration: Yauma Yata zakkarul insaanu ma sa'aa.
ayah.translation: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,

ayah.transliteration: Wa burrizatil-jaheemu limany-yaraa.
ayah.translation: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -

ayah.transliteration: Fa ammaa man taghaa.
ayah.translation: So as for he who transgressed

ayah.transliteration: Wa aasaral hayaatad dunyaa
ayah.translation: And preferred the life of the world,

ayah.transliteration: Fa innal jaheema hiyal maawaa.
ayah.translation: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammaa man khaafa maqaama Rabbihee wa nahan nafsa 'anil hawaa
ayah.translation: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,

ayah.transliteration: Fa innal jannata hiyal maawaa
ayah.translation: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.

ayah.transliteration: Yas'aloonaka 'anis saa'ati ayyaana mursaahaa
ayah.translation: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?

ayah.transliteration: Feema anta min zikraahaa
ayah.translation: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?

ayah.transliteration: Ilaa Rabbika muntahaa haa
ayah.translation: To your Lord is its finality.

ayah.transliteration: Innamaaa anta munziru maiy yakshaahaa
ayah.translation: You are only a warner for those who fear it.

ayah.transliteration: Ka annahum Yawma yarawnahaa lam yalbasooo illaa 'ashiyyatan aw duhaahaa
ayah.translation: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.

ayah.transliteration: 'Abasa wa tawallaa.
ayah.translation: The Prophet frowned and turned away

ayah.transliteration: An jaa-ahul 'a-maa
ayah.translation: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa yudreeka la'allahu yaz zakkaa.
ayah.translation: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified

ayah.transliteration: Au yaz zak karu fatanfa 'ahuz zikraa.
ayah.translation: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?

ayah.transliteration: Amma manis taghnaa
ayah.translation: As for he who thinks himself without need,

ayah.transliteration: Fa-anta lahu tasaddaa
ayah.translation: To him you give attention.

ayah.transliteration: Wa ma 'alaika allaa yaz zakka.
ayah.translation: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.

ayah.transliteration: Wa amma man jaa-aka yas'a
ayah.translation: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]

ayah.transliteration: Wahuwa yakhshaa,
ayah.translation: While he fears [Allah],

ayah.transliteration: Fa-anta 'anhu talah haa.
ayah.translation: From him you are distracted.

ayah.transliteration: Kalla innaha tazkirah
ayah.translation: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;

ayah.transliteration: Faman shaa a zakarah
ayah.translation: So whoever wills may remember it.

ayah.transliteration: Fi suhufim mukar rama,
ayah.translation: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,

ayah.transliteration: Marfoo'atim mutah hara,
ayah.translation: Exalted and purified,

ayah.transliteration: Bi'aidee safara
ayah.translation: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,

ayah.transliteration: Kiraamim bararah.
ayah.translation: Noble and dutiful.

ayah.transliteration: Qutilal-insanu maa akfarah.
ayah.translation: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.

ayah.transliteration: Min aiyyi shai-in Khalaq
ayah.translation: From what substance did He create him?

ayah.transliteration: Min nutfah; khalaqahu faqad-darah.
ayah.translation: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;

ayah.transliteration: Thummas sabeela yas-sarah
ayah.translation: Then He eased the way for him;

ayah.transliteration: Thumma amatahu fa-aqbarah
ayah.translation: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.

ayah.transliteration: Thumma iza shaa-a ansharah
ayah.translation: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.

ayah.transliteration: Kalla lamma yaqdi maa amarah.
ayah.translation: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.

ayah.transliteration: Falyanzuril insanu ilaa ta-amih
ayah.translation: Then let mankind look at his food -

ayah.transliteration: Anna sabab nalmaa-a sabba.
ayah.translation: How We poured down water in torrents,

ayah.transliteration: Thumma sha qaqnal-arda shaqqa.
ayah.translation: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],

ayah.transliteration: Fa ambatna feeha habba
ayah.translation: And caused to grow within it grain

ayah.transliteration: Wa 'inabaw-wa qadba
ayah.translation: And grapes and herbage

ayah.transliteration: Wa zaitoonaw wanakh la'
ayah.translation: And olive and palm trees

ayah.transliteration: Wa hadaa-iqa ghulba
ayah.translation: And gardens of dense shrubbery

ayah.transliteration: Wa faki hataw-wa abba.
ayah.translation: And fruit and grass -

ayah.transliteration: Mata'al-lakum wa li-an'amikum.
ayah.translation: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.

ayah.transliteration: Faiza jaa-atis saakhah.
ayah.translation: But when there comes the Deafening Blast

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yafir-rul mar-u min akheeh
ayah.translation: On the Day a man will flee from his brother

ayah.transliteration: Wa ummihee wa abeeh
ayah.translation: And his mother and his father

ayah.transliteration: Wa sahi batihee wa baneeh.
ayah.translation: And his wife and his children,

ayah.transliteration: Likul limri-im-minuhm yaumaa-izin shaa nuy-yughneeh
ayah.translation: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.

ayah.transliteration: Wujoo huny-yauma-izim-musfira;
ayah.translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -

ayah.transliteration: Dahi katum mustab shirah
ayah.translation: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.

ayah.transliteration: Wa wujoohuy yauma-izin 'alaiha ghabar a
ayah.translation: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.

ayah.transliteration: Tarhaquha qatarah.
ayah.translation: Blackness will cover them.

ayah.transliteration: Ulaa-ika humul-kafa ratul-fajarah.
ayah.translation: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.

ayah.transliteration: Izash shamsu kuwwirat
ayah.translation: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]

ayah.transliteration: Wa izan nujoomun kadarat
ayah.translation: And when the stars fall, dispersing,

ayah.transliteration: Wa izal jibaalu suyyirat
ayah.translation: And when the mountains are removed

ayah.transliteration: Wa izal 'ishaaru 'uttilat
ayah.translation: And when full-term she-camels are neglected

ayah.transliteration: Wa izal wuhooshu hushirat
ayah.translation: And when the wild beasts are gathered

ayah.transliteration: Wa izal bihaaru sujjirat
ayah.translation: And when the seas are filled with flame

ayah.transliteration: Wa izan nufoosu zuwwijat
ayah.translation: And when the souls are paired

ayah.transliteration: Wa izal maw'oodatu su'ilat
ayah.translation: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked

ayah.transliteration: Bi ayyi zambin qutilat
ayah.translation: For what sin she was killed

ayah.transliteration: Wa izas suhufu nushirat
ayah.translation: And when the pages are made public

ayah.transliteration: Wa izas samaaa'u kushitat
ayah.translation: And when the sky is stripped away

ayah.transliteration: Wa izal jaheemu su'-'irat
ayah.translation: And when Hellfire is set ablaze

ayah.transliteration: Wa izal jannatu uzlifat
ayah.translation: And when Paradise is brought near,

ayah.transliteration: 'Alimat nafsum maaa ahdarat
ayah.translation: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].

ayah.transliteration: Falaaa uqsimu bil khunnas
ayah.translation: So I swear by the retreating stars -

ayah.transliteration: Al jawaaril kunnas
ayah.translation: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -

ayah.transliteration: Wallaili izaa 'as'as
ayah.translation: And by the night as it closes in

ayah.transliteration: Wassubhi izaa tanaffas
ayah.translation: And by the dawn when it breathes

ayah.transliteration: Innahoo laqawlu rasoolin kareem
ayah.translation: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger

ayah.transliteration: Zee quwwatin 'inda zil 'arshi makeen
ayah.translation: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],

ayah.transliteration: Mutaa'in samma ameen
ayah.translation: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa saahibukum bimajnoon
ayah.translation: And your companion is not [at all] mad.

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ra aahu bilufuqil mubeen
ayah.translation: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa huwa 'alal ghaibi bidaneen
ayah.translation: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa huwa biqawli shaitaanir rajeem
ayah.translation: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].

ayah.transliteration: Fa ayna tazhaboon
ayah.translation: So where are you going?

ayah.transliteration: In huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen
ayah.translation: It is not except a reminder to the worlds

ayah.transliteration: Liman shaaa'a minkum ai yastaqeem
ayah.translation: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa tashaaa'oona illaaa ai yashaaa 'al laahu Rabbul 'Aalameen
ayah.translation: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.

ayah.transliteration: Izas samaaa'un fatarat
ayah.translation: When the sky breaks apart

ayah.transliteration: Wa izal kawaakibun tasarat
ayah.translation: And when the stars fall, scattering,

ayah.transliteration: Wa izal bihaaru fujjirat
ayah.translation: And when the seas are erupted

ayah.transliteration: Wa izal qubooru bu'sirat
ayah.translation: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,

ayah.transliteration: 'Alimat nafsum maa qaddamat wa akhkharat
ayah.translation: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.

ayah.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhal insaaanu maa gharraka bi Rabbikal kareem
ayah.translation: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,

ayah.transliteration: Allazee khalaqaka fasaw waaka fa'adalak
ayah.translation: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?

ayah.transliteration: Feee ayye sooratim maa shaaa'a rakkabak
ayah.translation: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.

ayah.transliteration: Kalla bal tukazziboona bid deen
ayah.translation: No! But you deny the Recompense.

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna 'alaikum lahaa fizeen
ayah.translation: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,

ayah.transliteration: Kiraaman kaatibeen
ayah.translation: Noble and recording;

ayah.transliteration: Ya'lamoona ma taf'aloon
ayah.translation: They know whatever you do.

ayah.transliteration: Innal abraara lafee na'eem
ayah.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,

ayah.transliteration: Wa innal fujjaara lafee jaheem
ayah.translation: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.

ayah.transliteration: Yaslawnahaa Yawmad Deen
ayah.translation: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa hum 'anhaa bighaaa 'ibeen
ayah.translation: And never therefrom will they be absent.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maaa adraaka maa Yawmud Deen
ayah.translation: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

ayah.transliteration: Summa maaa adraaka maa Yawmud Deen
ayah.translation: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

ayah.transliteration: Yawma laa tamliku nafsul linafsin shai'anw walamru yawma'izil lillaah
ayah.translation: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.

ayah.transliteration: Wailul lil mutaffifeen
ayah.translation: Woe to those who give less [than due],

ayah.transliteration: Allazeena izak taaloo 'alan naasi yastawfoon
ayah.translation: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.

ayah.transliteration: Wa izaa kaaloohum aw wazanoohum yukhsiroon
ayah.translation: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.

ayah.transliteration: Alaa yazunnu ulaaa'ika annahum mab'oosoon
ayah.translation: Do they not think that they will be resurrected

ayah.transliteration: Li Yawmin 'Azeem
ayah.translation: For a tremendous Day -

ayah.transliteration: Yawma yaqoomun naasu li Rabbil 'aalameen
ayah.translation: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?

ayah.transliteration: Kallaaa inna kitaabal fujjaari lafee Sijjeen
ayah.translation: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa adraaka maa Sijjeen
ayah.translation: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?

ayah.transliteration: Kitaabum marqoom
ayah.translation: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.

ayah.transliteration: Wailuny yawma'izil lil mukazzibeen
ayah.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,

ayah.transliteration: Allazeena yukazziboona bi yawmid deen
ayah.translation: Who deny the Day of Recompense.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa yukazzibu biheee illaa kullu mu'tadin aseem
ayah.translation: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.

ayah.transliteration: Izaa tutlaa'alaihi aayaatunaa qaala asaateerul awwaleen
ayah.translation: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

ayah.transliteration: Kallaa bal raana 'alaa quloobihim maa kaanoo yaksiboon
ayah.translation: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.

ayah.transliteration: Kallaaa innahum 'ar Rabbihim yawma'izil lamah jooboon
ayah.translation: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.

ayah.transliteration: Summa innahum lasaa lul jaheem
ayah.translation: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.

ayah.transliteration: Summa yuqaalu haazal lazee kuntum bihee tukazziboon
ayah.translation: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."

ayah.transliteration: Kallaaa inna kitaabal abraari lafee'Illiyyeen
ayah.translation: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maaa adraaka maa 'Illiyyoon
ayah.translation: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?

ayah.transliteration: Kitaabum marqoom
ayah.translation: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed

ayah.transliteration: Yashhadu hul muqarra boon
ayah.translation: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].

ayah.transliteration: Innal abraara lafee Na'eem
ayah.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure

ayah.transliteration: 'Alal araaa'iki yanzuroon
ayah.translation: On adorned couches, observing.

ayah.transliteration: Ta'rifu fee wujoohihim nadratan na'eem
ayah.translation: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.

ayah.transliteration: Yusqawna mir raheeqim makhtoom
ayah.translation: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.

ayah.transliteration: Khitaamuhoo misk; wa fee zaalika falyatanaafasil Mutanaafisoon
ayah.translation: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.

ayah.transliteration: Wa mizaajuhoo min Tasneem
ayah.translation: And its mixture is of Tasneem,

ayah.transliteration: 'Ainaiy yashrabu bihal muqarraboon
ayah.translation: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.

ayah.transliteration: Innal lazeena ajramoo kaanoo minal lazeena aamanoo yadhakoon
ayah.translation: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.

ayah.transliteration: Wa izaa marroo bihim yataghaamazoon
ayah.translation: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.

ayah.transliteration: Wa izan qalabooo ilaaa ahlihimun qalaboo fakiheen
ayah.translation: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.

ayah.transliteration: Wa izaa ra awhum qaalooo inna haaa'ulaaa'i ladaaal loon
ayah.translation: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."

ayah.transliteration: Wa maaa ursiloo 'alaihim haafizeen
ayah.translation: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.

ayah.transliteration: Fal yawmal lazeena aamanoo minal kuffaari yadhakoon
ayah.translation: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,

ayah.transliteration: 'Alal araaa'iki yanzuroon
ayah.translation: On adorned couches, observing.

ayah.transliteration: Hal suwwibal kuffaaru maa kaanoo yaf'aloon
ayah.translation: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?

ayah.transliteration: Izas samaaa'un shaqqat
ayah.translation: When the sky has split [open]

ayah.transliteration: Wa azinat li Rabbihaa wa huqqat
ayah.translation: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

ayah.transliteration: Wa izal ardu muddat
ayah.translation: And when the earth has been extended

ayah.transliteration: Wa alqat maa feehaa wa takhallat
ayah.translation: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]

ayah.transliteration: Wa azinat li Rabbihaa wa huqqat
ayah.translation: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -

ayah.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhal insaanu innaka kaadihun ilaa Rabbika kad han famulaaqeeh
ayah.translation: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.

ayah.transliteration: Fa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo biyameenih
ayah.translation: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,

ayah.transliteration: Fasawfa yuhaasabu hi saabai yaseeraa
ayah.translation: He will be judged with an easy account

ayah.transliteration: Wa yanqalibu ilaaa ahlihee masrooraa
ayah.translation: And return to his people in happiness.

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo waraaa'a zahrih
ayah.translation: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,

ayah.transliteration: Fasawfa yad'oo subooraa
ayah.translation: He will cry out for destruction

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaslaa sa'eeraa
ayah.translation: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.

ayah.transliteration: Innahoo kaana feee ahlihee masrooraa
ayah.translation: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;

ayah.transliteration: Innahoo zanna al lai yahoor
ayah.translation: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].

ayah.transliteration: Balaaa inna Rabbahoo kaana bihee baseeraa
ayah.translation: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.

ayah.transliteration: Falaaa uqsimu bishshafaq
ayah.translation: So I swear by the twilight glow

ayah.transliteration: Wallaili wa maa wasaq
ayah.translation: And [by] the night and what it envelops

ayah.transliteration: Walqamari izat tasaq
ayah.translation: And [by] the moon when it becomes full

ayah.transliteration: Latarkabunna tabaqan 'an tabaq
ayah.translation: [That] you will surely experience state after state.

ayah.transliteration: Famaa lahum laa yu'minoon
ayah.translation: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,

ayah.transliteration: Wa izaa quri'a 'alaihimul Quraanu laa yasjudoon
ayah.translation: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?

ayah.transliteration: Balil lazeena kafaroo yukazziboon
ayah.translation: But those who have disbelieved deny,

ayah.transliteration: Wallaahu a'lamu bimaa yoo'oon
ayah.translation: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.

ayah.transliteration: Fabashshirhum bi'azaabin aleem
ayah.translation: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,

ayah.transliteration: Illal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon
ayah.translation: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.

ayah.transliteration: Wassamaaa'i zaatil burooj
ayah.translation: By the sky containing great stars

ayah.transliteration: Wal yawmil maw'ood
ayah.translation: And [by] the promised Day

ayah.transliteration: Wa shaahidinw wa mashhood
ayah.translation: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,

ayah.transliteration: Qutila as haabul ukhdood
ayah.translation: Cursed were the companions of the trench

ayah.transliteration: Annaari zaatil waqood
ayah.translation: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,

ayah.transliteration: Iz hum 'alaihaa qu'ood
ayah.translation: When they were sitting near it

ayah.transliteration: Wa hum 'alaa maa yaf'aloona bilmu 'mineena shuhood
ayah.translation: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa naqamoo minhum illaaa aiyu'minoo billaahil 'azeezil Hameed
ayah.translation: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,

ayah.transliteration: Allazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ard; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai 'in Shaheed
ayah.translation: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.

ayah.transliteration: Innal lazeena fatanul mu'mineena wal mu'minaati summa lam yatooboo falahum 'azaabu Jahannama wa lahum 'azaabul hareeq
ayah.translation: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.

ayah.transliteration: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum Jannaatun tajree min tahtihal anhaar; zaalikal fawzul kabeer
ayah.translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.

ayah.transliteration: Inna batsha Rabbika lashadeed
ayah.translation: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.

ayah.transliteration: Innahoo Huwa yubdi'u wa yu'eed
ayah.translation: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.

ayah.transliteration: Wa Huwal Ghafoorul Wadood
ayah.translation: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,

ayah.transliteration: Zul 'Arshil Majeed
ayah.translation: Honorable Owner of the Throne,

ayah.transliteration: Fa' 'aalul limaa yureed
ayah.translation: Effecter of what He intends.

ayah.transliteration: Hal ataaka hadeesul junood
ayah.translation: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -

ayah.transliteration: Fir'awna wa Samood
ayah.translation: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?

ayah.transliteration: Balil lazeena kafaroo fee takzeeb
ayah.translation: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,

ayah.transliteration: Wallaahu minw waraaa'ihim muheet
ayah.translation: While Allah encompasses them from behind.

ayah.transliteration: Bal huwa Quraanum Majeed
ayah.translation: But this is an honored Qur'an

ayah.transliteration: Fee Lawhim Mahfooz
ayah.translation: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.

ayah.transliteration: Wassamaaa'i wattaariq
ayah.translation: By the sky and the night comer -

ayah.transliteration: Wa maaa adraaka mattaariq
ayah.translation: And what can make you know what is the night comer?

ayah.transliteration: Annajmus saaqib
ayah.translation: It is the piercing star -

ayah.transliteration: In kullu nafsil lammaa 'alaihaa haafiz
ayah.translation: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.

ayah.transliteration: Fal yanzuril insaanu mimma khuliq
ayah.translation: So let man observe from what he was created.

ayah.transliteration: Khuliqa mim maaa'in daafiq
ayah.translation: He was created from a fluid, ejected,

ayah.transliteration: Yakhruju mim bainissulbi wat taraaa'ib
ayah.translation: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.

ayah.transliteration: Innahoo 'alaa raj'ihee laqaadir
ayah.translation: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.

ayah.transliteration: Yawma tublas saraaa'ir
ayah.translation: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,

ayah.transliteration: Famaa lahoo min quwwatinw wa laa naasir
ayah.translation: Then man will have no power or any helper.

ayah.transliteration: Wassamaaa'i zaatir raj'
ayah.translation: By the sky which returns [rain]

ayah.transliteration: Wal ardi zaatis sad'
ayah.translation: And [by] the earth which cracks open,

ayah.transliteration: Innahoo laqawlun fasl
ayah.translation: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa huwa bil hazl
ayah.translation: And it is not amusement.

ayah.transliteration: Innahum yakeedoona kaidaa
ayah.translation: Indeed, they are planning a plan,

ayah.transliteration: Wa akeedu kaidaa
ayah.translation: But I am planning a plan.

ayah.transliteration: Famahhilil kaafireena amhilhum ruwaidaa
ayah.translation: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.

ayah.transliteration: Sabbihisma Rabbikal A'laa
ayah.translation: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,

ayah.transliteration: Allazee khalaqa fasawwaa
ayah.translation: Who created and proportioned

ayah.transliteration: Wallazee qaddara fahadaa
ayah.translation: And who destined and [then] guided

ayah.transliteration: Wallazeee akhrajal mar'aa
ayah.translation: And who brings out the pasture

ayah.transliteration: Faja'alahoo ghusaaa'an ahwaa
ayah.translation: And [then] makes it black stubble.

ayah.transliteration: Sanuqri'uka falaa tansaaa
ayah.translation: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,

ayah.transliteration: Illaa maa shaaa'al laah; innahoo ya'lamul jahra wa maa yakhfaa
ayah.translation: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.

ayah.transliteration: Wa nu-yassiruka lilyusraa
ayah.translation: And We will ease you toward ease.

ayah.transliteration: Fazakkir in nafa'atizzikraa
ayah.translation: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;

ayah.transliteration: Sa yazzakkaru maiyakhshaa
ayah.translation: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.

ayah.transliteration: Wa yatajannabuhal ashqaa
ayah.translation: But the wretched one will avoid it -

ayah.transliteration: Allazee yaslan Naaral kubraa
ayah.translation: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,

ayah.transliteration: Summa laa yamootu feehaa wa laa yahyaa
ayah.translation: Neither dying therein nor living.

ayah.transliteration: Qad aflaha man tazakkaa
ayah.translation: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself

ayah.transliteration: Wa zakaras ma Rabbihee fasallaa
ayah.translation: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.

ayah.transliteration: Bal tu'siroonal hayaatad dunyaa
ayah.translation: But you prefer the worldly life,

ayah.transliteration: Wal Aakhiratu khairunw wa abqaa
ayah.translation: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.

ayah.transliteration: Inna haazaa lafis suhu fil oolaa
ayah.translation: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,

ayah.transliteration: Suhufi Ibraaheema wa Moosaa
ayah.translation: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

ayah.transliteration: Hal ataaka hadeesul ghaashiyah
ayah.translation: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?

ayah.transliteration: Wujoohuny yawma 'izin khaashi'ah
ayah.translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,

ayah.transliteration: 'Aamilatun naasibah
ayah.translation: Working [hard] and exhausted.

ayah.transliteration: Taslaa naaran haamiyah
ayah.translation: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.

ayah.transliteration: Tusqaa min 'aynin aaniyah
ayah.translation: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.

ayah.transliteration: Laisa lahum ta'aamun illaa min daree'
ayah.translation: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant

ayah.transliteration: Laa yusminu wa laa yughnee min joo'
ayah.translation: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.

ayah.transliteration: Wujoohuny yawma 'izin naa'imah
ayah.translation: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.

ayah.transliteration: Lisa'yihaa raadiyah
ayah.translation: With their effort [they are] satisfied

ayah.transliteration: Fee jannatin 'aaliyah
ayah.translation: In an elevated garden,

ayah.transliteration: Laa tasma'u feehaa laaghiyah
ayah.translation: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.

ayah.transliteration: Feehaa 'aynun jaariyah
ayah.translation: Within it is a flowing spring.

ayah.transliteration: Feehaa sururum marfoo'ah
ayah.translation: Within it are couches raised high

ayah.transliteration: Wa akwaabum mawdoo 'ah
ayah.translation: And cups put in place

ayah.transliteration: Wa namaariqu masfoofah
ayah.translation: And cushions lined up

ayah.transliteration: Wa zaraabiyyu mabsoosah
ayah.translation: And carpets spread around.

ayah.transliteration: Afalaa yanzuroona ilalibili kaifa khuliqat
ayah.translation: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?

ayah.transliteration: Wa ilas samaaa'i kaifa rufi'at
ayah.translation: And at the sky - how it is raised?

ayah.transliteration: Wa ilal jibaali kaifa nusibat
ayah.translation: And at the mountains - how they are erected?

ayah.transliteration: Wa ilal ardi kaifa sutihat
ayah.translation: And at the earth - how it is spread out?

ayah.transliteration: Fazakkir innama anta Muzakkir
ayah.translation: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.

ayah.transliteration: Lasta 'alaihim bimusaitir
ayah.translation: You are not over them a controller.

ayah.transliteration: Illaa man tawallaa wa kafar
ayah.translation: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -

ayah.transliteration: Fa yu'azzibuhul laahul 'azaabal akbar
ayah.translation: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.

ayah.transliteration: Innaa ilainaaa iyaabahum
ayah.translation: Indeed, to Us is their return.

ayah.transliteration: Summa inna 'alainaa hisaabahum
ayah.translation: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.

ayah.transliteration: Wal-Fajr
ayah.translation: By the dawn

ayah.transliteration: Wa layaalin 'ashr
ayah.translation: And [by] ten nights

ayah.transliteration: Wash shaf'i wal watr
ayah.translation: And [by] the even [number] and the odd

ayah.transliteration: Wallaili izaa yasr
ayah.translation: And [by] the night when it passes,

ayah.transliteration: Hal fee zaalika qasamul lizee hijr
ayah.translation: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi'aad
ayah.translation: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -

ayah.transliteration: Iramaa zaatil 'imaad
ayah.translation: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,

ayah.transliteration: Allatee lam yukhlaq misluhaa fil bilaad
ayah.translation: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?

ayah.transliteration: Wa samoodal lazeena jaabus sakhra bil waad
ayah.translation: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?

ayah.transliteration: Wa fir'awna zil awtaad
ayah.translation: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -

ayah.transliteration: Allazeena taghaw fil bilaad
ayah.translation: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands

ayah.transliteration: Fa aksaroo feehal fasaad
ayah.translation: And increased therein the corruption.

ayah.transliteration: Fasabba 'alaihim Rabbuka sawta 'azaab
ayah.translation: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.

ayah.transliteration: Inna Rabbaka labil mirsaad
ayah.translation: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.

ayah.transliteration: Fa ammal insaanu izaa mab talaahu Rabbuhoo fa akramahoo wa na' 'amahoo fa yaqoolu Rabbeee akraman
ayah.translation: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammaaa izaa mabtalaahu faqadara 'alaihi rizqahoo fa yaqoolu Rabbeee ahaanan
ayah.translation: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."

ayah.transliteration: Kalla bal laa tukrimooo nal yateem
ayah.translation: No! But you do not honor the orphan

ayah.transliteration: Wa laa tahaaaddoona 'alaata'aamil miskeen
ayah.translation: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.

ayah.transliteration: Wa taakuloonat turaasa aklal lammaa
ayah.translation: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,

ayah.transliteration: Wa tuhibboonal maala hubban jammaa
ayah.translation: And you love wealth with immense love.

ayah.transliteration: Kallaaa izaaa dukkatil ardu dakkan dakka
ayah.translation: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -

ayah.transliteration: Wa jaaa'a Rabbuka wal malaku saffan saffaa
ayah.translation: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,

ayah.transliteration: Wa jeee'a yawma'izim bi jahannnam; Yawma 'iziny yatazakkarul insaanu wa annaa lahuz zikraa
ayah.translation: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?

ayah.transliteration: Yaqoolu yaa laitanee qaddamtu lihayaatee
ayah.translation: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."

ayah.transliteration: Fa Yawma izil laa yu'azzibu 'azaabahooo ahad
ayah.translation: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,

ayah.transliteration: Wa laa yoosiqu wasaaqa hooo ahad
ayah.translation: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].

ayah.transliteration: Yaaa ayyatuhan nafsul mutma 'innah
ayah.translation: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,

ayah.transliteration: Irji'eee ilaa Rabbiki raadiyatam mardiyyah
ayah.translation: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],

ayah.transliteration: Fadkhulee fee 'ibaadee
ayah.translation: And enter among My [righteous] servants

ayah.transliteration: Wadkhulee jannatee
ayah.translation: And enter My Paradise."

ayah.transliteration: Laaa uqsimu bihaazal balad
ayah.translation: I swear by this city, Makkah -

ayah.transliteration: Wa anta hillum bihaazal balad
ayah.translation: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -

ayah.transliteration: Wa waalidinw wa maa walad
ayah.translation: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],

ayah.transliteration: Laqad khalaqnal insaana fee kabad
ayah.translation: We have certainly created man into hardship.

ayah.transliteration: Ayahsabu al-lai yaqdira 'alaihi ahad
ayah.translation: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?

ayah.transliteration: Yaqoolu ahlaktu maalal lubadaa
ayah.translation: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."

ayah.transliteration: Ayahsabu al lam yarahooo ahad
ayah.translation: Does he think that no one has seen him?

ayah.transliteration: Alam naj'al lahoo 'aynayn
ayah.translation: Have We not made for him two eyes?

ayah.transliteration: Wa lisaananw wa shafatayn
ayah.translation: And a tongue and two lips?

ayah.transliteration: Wa hadaynaahun najdayn
ayah.translation: And have shown him the two ways?

ayah.transliteration: Falaq tahamal-'aqabah
ayah.translation: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maaa adraaka mal'aqabah
ayah.translation: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?

ayah.transliteration: Fakku raqabah
ayah.translation: It is the freeing of a slave

ayah.transliteration: Aw it'aamun fee yawmin zee masghabah
ayah.translation: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger

ayah.transliteration: Yateeman zaa maqrabah
ayah.translation: An orphan of near relationship

ayah.transliteration: Aw miskeenan zaa matrabah
ayah.translation: Or a needy person in misery

ayah.transliteration: Summa kaana minal lazeena aamanoo wa tawaasaw bissabri wa tawaasaw bilmarhamah
ayah.translation: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.

ayah.transliteration: Ulaaa'ika As-haabul maimanah
ayah.translation: Those are the companions of the right.

ayah.transliteration: Wallazeena kafaroo bi aayaatinaa hum as-haabul Mash'amah
ayah.translation: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.

ayah.transliteration: Alaihim naarum mu'sadah
ayah.translation: Over them will be fire closed in.

ayah.transliteration: Wash shamsi wa duhaa haa
ayah.translation: By the sun and its brightness

ayah.transliteration: Wal qamari izaa talaa haa
ayah.translation: And [by] the moon when it follows it

ayah.transliteration: Wannahaari izaa jallaa haa
ayah.translation: And [by] the day when it displays it

ayah.transliteration: Wallaili izaa yaghshaa haa
ayah.translation: And [by] the night when it covers it

ayah.transliteration: Wassamaaa'i wa maa banaahaa
ayah.translation: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it

ayah.transliteration: Wal ardi wa maa tahaahaa
ayah.translation: And [by] the earth and He who spread it

ayah.transliteration: Wa nafsinw wa maa sawwaahaa
ayah.translation: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it

ayah.transliteration: Fa-alhamahaa fujoorahaa wa taqwaahaa
ayah.translation: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,

ayah.transliteration: Qad aflaha man zakkaahaa
ayah.translation: He has succeeded who purifies it,

ayah.transliteration: Wa qad khaaba man dassaahaa
ayah.translation: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].

ayah.transliteration: Kazzabat Samoodu bi taghwaahaaa
ayah.translation: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,

ayah.transliteration: Izim ba'asa ashqaahaa
ayah.translation: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.

ayah.transliteration: Faqaala lahum Rasoolul laahi naaqatal laahi wa suqiyaahaa
ayah.translation: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."

ayah.transliteration: Fakazzaboohu fa'aqaroohaa fadamdama 'alaihim Rabbuhum bizambihim fasaw waahaa
ayah.translation: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].

ayah.transliteration: Wa laa yakhaafu'uqbaahaa
ayah.translation: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.

ayah.transliteration: Wallaili izaa yaghshaa
ayah.translation: By the night when it covers

ayah.transliteration: Wannahaari izaa tajalla
ayah.translation: And [by] the day when it appears

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa khalaqaz zakara wal unthaa
ayah.translation: And [by] He who created the male and female,

ayah.transliteration: Inna sa'yakum lashattaa
ayah.translation: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.

ayah.transliteration: Fa ammaa man a'taa wattaqaa
ayah.translation: As for he who gives and fears Allah

ayah.transliteration: Wa saddaqa bil husnaa
ayah.translation: And believes in the best [reward],

ayah.transliteration: Fasanu yassiruhoo lilyusraa
ayah.translation: We will ease him toward ease.

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammaa mam bakhila wastaghnaa
ayah.translation: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need

ayah.transliteration: Wa kazzaba bil husnaa
ayah.translation: And denies the best [reward],

ayah.transliteration: Fasanu yassiruhoo lil'usraa
ayah.translation: We will ease him toward difficulty.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa yughnee 'anhu maaluhooo izaa taraddaa
ayah.translation: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?

ayah.transliteration: Inna 'alainaa lal hudaa
ayah.translation: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna lanaa lal Aakhirata wal oolaa
ayah.translation: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

ayah.transliteration: Fa anzartukum naaran talazzaa
ayah.translation: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.

ayah.transliteration: Laa yaslaahaaa illal ashqaa
ayah.translation: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.

ayah.transliteration: Allazee kazzaba wa tawallaa
ayah.translation: Who had denied and turned away.

ayah.transliteration: Wa sa yujannnabuhal atqaa
ayah.translation: But the righteous one will avoid it -

ayah.transliteration: Allazee yu'tee maalahoo yatazakkaa
ayah.translation: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa li ahadin 'indahoo min ni'matin tujzaaa
ayah.translation: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded

ayah.transliteration: Illab tighaaa'a wajhi rabbihil a 'laa
ayah.translation: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.

ayah.transliteration: Wa lasawfa yardaa
ayah.translation: And he is going to be satisfied.

ayah.transliteration: Wad duhaa
ayah.translation: By the morning brightness

ayah.transliteration: Wal laili iza sajaa
ayah.translation: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,

ayah.transliteration: Ma wad da'aka rabbuka wa ma qalaa
ayah.translation: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].

ayah.transliteration: Walal-aakhiratu khairul laka minal-oola
ayah.translation: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].

ayah.transliteration: Wa la sawfa y'uteeka rabbuka fatarda
ayah.translation: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.

ayah.transliteration: Alam ya jidka yateeman fa aawaa
ayah.translation: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?

ayah.transliteration: Wa wa jadaka daal lan fahada
ayah.translation: And He found you lost and guided [you],

ayah.transliteration: Wa wa jadaka 'aa-ilan fa aghnaa
ayah.translation: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.

ayah.transliteration: Fa am mal yateema fala taqhar
ayah.translation: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].

ayah.transliteration: Wa am mas saa-ila fala tanhar
ayah.translation: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].

ayah.transliteration: Wa amma bi ni'mati rabbika fahad dith
ayah.translation: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].

ayah.transliteration: Alam nashrah laka sadrak
ayah.translation: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?

ayah.transliteration: Wa wa d'ana 'anka wizrak
ayah.translation: And We removed from you your burden

ayah.transliteration: Allazee anqada zahrak
ayah.translation: Which had weighed upon your back

ayah.transliteration: Wa raf 'ana laka zikrak
ayah.translation: And raised high for you your repute.

ayah.transliteration: Fa inna ma'al usri yusra
ayah.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

ayah.transliteration: Inna ma'al 'usri yusra
ayah.translation: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

ayah.transliteration: Fa iza faragh ta fansab
ayah.translation: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].

ayah.transliteration: Wa ilaa rabbika far ghab
ayah.translation: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.

ayah.transliteration: Wat teeni waz zaitoon
ayah.translation: By the fig and the olive

ayah.transliteration: Wa toori sineen
ayah.translation: And [by] Mount Sinai

ayah.transliteration: Wa haazal balad-il ameen
ayah.translation: And [by] this secure city [Makkah],

ayah.transliteration: Laqad khalaqnal insaana fee ahsani taqweem
ayah.translation: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;

ayah.transliteration: Thumma ra dad naahu asfala saafileen
ayah.translation: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,

ayah.transliteration: Ill-lal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati; falahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon
ayah.translation: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.

ayah.transliteration: Fama yu kaz zibuka b'adu bid deen
ayah.translation: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?

ayah.transliteration: Alai sal laahu bi-ahkamil haakimeen
ayah.translation: Is not Allah the most just of judges?

ayah.transliteration: Iqra bismi rab bikal lazee khalaq
ayah.translation: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -

ayah.transliteration: Khalaqal insaana min 'alaq
ayah.translation: Created man from a clinging substance.

ayah.transliteration: Iqra wa rab bukal akram
ayah.translation: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -

ayah.transliteration: Al lazee 'allama bil qalam
ayah.translation: Who taught by the pen -

ayah.transliteration: 'Al lamal insaana ma lam y'alam
ayah.translation: Taught man that which he knew not.

ayah.transliteration: Kallaa innal insaana layatghaa
ayah.translation: No! [But] indeed, man transgresses

ayah.transliteration: Ar-ra aahus taghnaa
ayah.translation: Because he sees himself self-sufficient.

ayah.transliteration: Innna ilaa rabbikar ruj'aa
ayah.translation: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.

ayah.transliteration: Ara-aital lazee yanhaa
ayah.translation: Have you seen the one who forbids

ayah.transliteration: 'Abdan iza sallaa
ayah.translation: A servant when he prays?

ayah.transliteration: Ara-aita in kana 'alal hudaa
ayah.translation: Have you seen if he is upon guidance

ayah.transliteration: Au amara bit taqwaa
ayah.translation: Or enjoins righteousness?

ayah.transliteration: Ara-aita in kaz zaba wa ta walla
ayah.translation: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -

ayah.transliteration: Alam y'alam bi-an nal lahaa yaraa
ayah.translation: Does he not know that Allah sees?

ayah.transliteration: Kalla la illam yantahi la nasfa'am bin nasiyah
ayah.translation: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -

ayah.transliteration: Nasiyatin kazi batin khaatiyah
ayah.translation: A lying, sinning forelock.

ayah.transliteration: Fal yad'u naadiyah
ayah.translation: Then let him call his associates;

ayah.transliteration: Sanad 'uz zabaaniyah
ayah.translation: We will call the angels of Hell.

ayah.transliteration: Kalla; la tuti'hu wasjud waqtarib
ayah.translation: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].

ayah.transliteration: Innaa anzalnaahu fee lailatil qadr
ayah.translation: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa adraaka ma lailatul qadr
ayah.translation: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

ayah.transliteration: Lailatul qadri khairum min alfee shahr
ayah.translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

ayah.transliteration: Tanaz zalul malaa-ikatu war roohu feeha bi izni-rab bihim min kulli amr
ayah.translation: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.

ayah.transliteration: Salaamun hiya hattaa mat la'il fajr
ayah.translation: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.

ayah.transliteration: Lam ya kunil lazeena kafaru min ahlil kitaabi wal mushri keena mun fak keena hattaa ta-tiya humul bayyinah
ayah.translation: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence -

ayah.transliteration: Rasoolum minal laahi yatlu suhufam mutahharah
ayah.translation: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures

ayah.transliteration: Feeha kutubun qaiyimah
ayah.translation: Within which are correct writings.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa tafarraqal lazeena ootul kitaaba il-la mim b'adi ma jaa-at humul baiyyinah
ayah.translation: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa umiroo il-la liy'abu dul laaha mukhliseena lahud-deena huna faa-a wa yuqeemus salaahta wa yu-tuz zakaata; wa zaalika deenul qaiyimah
ayah.translation: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion.

ayah.transliteration: Innal lazeena kafaru min ahlil kitaabi wal mushri keena fee nari jahan nama khaali deena feeha; ulaa-ika hum shar rul ba reeyah
ayah.translation: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.

ayah.transliteration: Innal lazeena aamanu wa 'amilus saalihaati ula-ika hum khairul bareey yah
ayah.translation: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.

ayah.transliteration: Jazaa-uhum inda rabbihim jan naatu 'adnin tajree min tahtihal an haaru khalideena feeha abada; radiy-yallaahu 'anhum wa ra du 'an zaalika liman khashiya rabbah.
ayah.translation: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.

ayah.transliteration: Izaa zul zilatil ardu zil zaalaha
ayah.translation: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake

ayah.transliteration: Wa akh rajatil ardu athqaalaha
ayah.translation: And the earth discharges its burdens

ayah.transliteration: Wa qaalal insaanu ma laha
ayah.translation: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -

ayah.transliteration: Yawmaa izin tuhad dithu akhbaaraha
ayah.translation: That Day, it will report its news

ayah.transliteration: Bi-anna rabbaka awhaa laha
ayah.translation: Because your Lord has commanded it.

ayah.transliteration: Yawma iziy yas durun naasu ash tatal liyuraw a'maalahum
ayah.translation: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.

ayah.transliteration: Famaiy ya'mal mithqala zarratin khai raiy-yarah
ayah.translation: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,

ayah.transliteration: Wa maiy-y'amal mithqala zarratin sharraiy-yarah
ayah.translation: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.

ayah.transliteration: Wal'aadi yaati dabha
ayah.translation: By the racers, panting,

ayah.transliteration: Fal moori yaati qadha
ayah.translation: And the producers of sparks [when] striking

ayah.transliteration: Fal mugheeraati subha
ayah.translation: And the chargers at dawn,

ayah.transliteration: Fa atharna bihee naq'a
ayah.translation: Stirring up thereby [clouds of] dust,

ayah.transliteration: Fawa satna bihee jam'a
ayah.translation: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,

ayah.transliteration: Innal-insana lirabbihee lakanood
ayah.translation: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahu 'alaa zaalika la shaheed
ayah.translation: And indeed, he is to that a witness.

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahu lihubbil khairi la shadeed
ayah.translation: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.

ayah.transliteration: Afala ya'lamu iza b'uthira ma filquboor
ayah.translation: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered

ayah.transliteration: Wa hussila maa fis sudoor
ayah.translation: And that within the breasts is obtained,

ayah.transliteration: Inna rabbahum bihim yauma 'izil la khabeer
ayah.translation: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.

ayah.transliteration: Al qaari'ah
ayah.translation: The Striking Calamity -

ayah.transliteration: Mal qaariah
ayah.translation: What is the Striking Calamity?

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa adraaka mal qaari'ah
ayah.translation: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?

ayah.transliteration: Yauma ya koonun naasu kal farashil mabthooth
ayah.translation: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,

ayah.transliteration: Wa ta koonul jibalu kal 'ihnil manfoosh
ayah.translation: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.

ayah.transliteration: Fa-amma man thaqulat mawa zeenuh
ayah.translation: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],

ayah.transliteration: Fahuwa fee 'ishatir raadiyah
ayah.translation: He will be in a pleasant life.

ayah.transliteration: Wa amma man khaffat mawa zeenuh
ayah.translation: But as for one whose scales are light,

ayah.transliteration: Fa-ummuhu haawiyah
ayah.translation: His refuge will be an abyss.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa adraaka maa hiyah
ayah.translation: And what can make you know what that is?

ayah.transliteration: Naarun hamiyah
ayah.translation: It is a Fire, intensely hot.

ayah.transliteration: Al haaku mut takathur
ayah.translation: Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you

ayah.transliteration: Hatta zurtumul-maqaabir
ayah.translation: Until you visit the graveyards.

ayah.transliteration: Kalla sawfa ta'lamoon
ayah.translation: No! You are going to know.

ayah.transliteration: Thumma kalla sawfa ta'lamoon
ayah.translation: Then no! You are going to know.

ayah.transliteration: Kalla law ta'lamoona 'ilmal yaqeen
ayah.translation: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...

ayah.transliteration: Latara-wun nal jaheem
ayah.translation: You will surely see the Hellfire.

ayah.transliteration: Thumma latara wunnaha 'ainal yaqeen
ayah.translation: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.

ayah.transliteration: Thumma latus alunna yauma-izin 'anin na'eem
ayah.translation: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.

ayah.transliteration: Wal' asr
ayah.translation: By time,

ayah.transliteration: Innal insaana lafee khusr
ayah.translation: Indeed, mankind is in loss,

ayah.transliteration: Il lal lazeena aamanu wa 'amilus saali haati wa tawa saw bil haqqi wa tawa saw bis sabr
ayah.translation: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.

ayah.transliteration: Wai lul-li kulli hu mazatil-lumaza
ayah.translation: Woe to every scorner and mocker

ayah.transliteration: Al-lazi jama'a maalaw wa'addadah
ayah.translation: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.

ayah.transliteration: Yahsabu anna maalahu akhladah
ayah.translation: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.

ayah.transliteration: Kalla layum ba zanna fil hutamah
ayah.translation: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.

ayah.transliteration: Wa maa adraaka mal-hutamah
ayah.translation: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?

ayah.transliteration: Narul laahil-mooqada
ayah.translation: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,

ayah.transliteration: Al latee tat tali'u 'alalafidah
ayah.translation: Which mounts directed at the hearts.

ayah.transliteration: Innaha 'alaihim moosada
ayah.translation: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them

ayah.transliteration: Fee 'amadim-mu mad dadah
ayah.translation: In extended columns.

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi ashaabil feel
ayah.translation: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?

ayah.transliteration: Alam yaj'al kai dahum fee tad leel
ayah.translation: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?

ayah.transliteration: Wa arsala 'alaihim tairan abaabeel
ayah.translation: And He sent against them birds in flocks,

ayah.transliteration: Tar meehim bi hi jaaratim min sij jeel
ayah.translation: Striking them with stones of hard clay,

ayah.transliteration: Faja 'alahum ka'asfim m'akool
ayah.translation: And He made them like eaten straw.

ayah.transliteration: Li-ilaafi quraish
ayah.translation: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -

ayah.transliteration: Elaafihim rihlatash shitaa-i wass saif
ayah.translation: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -

ayah.transliteration: Fal y'abudu rabba haazal-bait
ayah.translation: Let them worship the Lord of this House,

ayah.transliteration: Allazi at'amahum min ju'inw-wa-aamana hum min khawf
ayah.translation: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.

ayah.transliteration: Ara-aital lazee yu kazzibu bid deen
ayah.translation: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?

ayah.transliteration: Fa zaalikal lazi yadu'ul-yateem
ayah.translation: For that is the one who drives away the orphan

ayah.transliteration: Wa la ya huddu 'alaa ta'amil miskeen
ayah.translation: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

ayah.transliteration: Fa wai lul-lil mu salleen
ayah.translation: So woe to those who pray

ayah.transliteration: Al lazeena hum 'an salaatihim sahoon
ayah.translation: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -

ayah.transliteration: Al lazeena hum yuraa-oon
ayah.translation: Those who make show [of their deeds]

ayah.transliteration: Wa yamna'oonal ma'oon
ayah.translation: And withhold [simple] assistance.

ayah.transliteration: Innaa a'taina kal kauthar
ayah.translation: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.

ayah.transliteration: Fa salli li rabbika wanhar
ayah.translation: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].

ayah.transliteration: Inna shani-aka huwal abtar
ayah.translation: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.

ayah.transliteration: Qul yaa-ai yuhal kaafiroon
ayah.translation: Say, "O disbelievers,

ayah.transliteration: Laa a'budu ma t'abudoon
ayah.translation: I do not worship what you worship.

ayah.transliteration: Wa laa antum 'aabidoona maa a'bud
ayah.translation: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.

ayah.transliteration: Wa laa ana 'abidum maa 'abattum
ayah.translation: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.

ayah.transliteration: Wa laa antum 'aabidoona ma a'bud
ayah.translation: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.

ayah.transliteration: Lakum deenukum wa liya deen.
ayah.translation: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."

ayah.transliteration: Iza jaa-a nas rullahi walfath
ayah.translation: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,

ayah.transliteration: Wa ra-aitan naasa yadkhuloona fee deenil laahi afwajah
ayah.translation: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,

ayah.transliteration: Fa sab bih bihamdi rabbika was taghfir, innahu kaana tawwaaba
ayah.translation: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.

ayah.transliteration: Tab bat yadaa abee Lahabinw-wa tabb
ayah.translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

ayah.transliteration: Maa aghna 'anhu maaluhu wa ma kasab
ayah.translation: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.

ayah.transliteration: Sa yas laa naran zaata lahab
ayah.translation: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame

ayah.transliteration: Wam ra-atuh hamma latal-hatab
ayah.translation: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.

ayah.transliteration: Fee jeediha hab lum mim-masad
ayah.translation: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.

ayah.transliteration: Qul huwal laahu ahad
ayah.translation: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,

ayah.transliteration: Allah hus-samad
ayah.translation: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.

ayah.transliteration: Lam yalid wa lam yoolad
ayah.translation: He neither begets nor is born,

ayah.transliteration: Wa lam yakul-lahu kufuwan ahad
ayah.translation: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."

ayah.transliteration: Qul a'uzoo bi rabbil-falaq
ayah.translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak

ayah.transliteration: Min sharri ma khalaq
ayah.translation: From the evil of that which He created

ayah.transliteration: Wa min sharri ghasiqin iza waqab
ayah.translation: And from the evil of darkness when it settles

ayah.transliteration: Wa min sharrin-naffaa-thaati fil 'uqad
ayah.translation: And from the evil of the blowers in knots

ayah.transliteration: Wa min shar ri haasidin iza hasad
ayah.translation: And from the evil of an envier when he envies."

ayah.transliteration: Qul a'uzu birabbin naas
ayah.translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,

ayah.transliteration: Malikin naas
ayah.translation: The Sovereign of mankind.

ayah.transliteration: Ilaahin naas
ayah.translation: The God of mankind,

ayah.transliteration: Min sharril was waasil khannaas
ayah.translation: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -

ayah.transliteration: Al lazee yuwas wisu fee sudoorin naas
ayah.translation: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -

ayah.transliteration: Minal jinnati wan naas
ayah.translation: From among the jinn and mankind."
